+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { darkTheme } from 'naive-ui'
+ 
+ export const useAppStore = defineStore('app', () => {
+   // ===== çŠ¶æ€å®šä¹‰ =====
+   
+   // ä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®
+   const isDark = ref(false)
+   const theme = computed(() => isDark.value ? darkTheme : null)
+   
+   // å¸ƒå±€è®¾ç½®
+   const sidebarCollapsed = ref(false)
+   const showSettings = ref(false)
+   const showNotifications = ref(false)
+   
+   // åº”ç”¨é…ç½®
+   const config = ref({
+     language: 'zh-CN',
+     autoRefresh: true,
+     refreshInterval: 30000, // 30ç§’
+     pageSize: 20,
+     timeFormat: 'relative', // 'relative' | 'absolute'
+     enableAnimation: true,
+     enableSound: false,
+   })
+   
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   const loading = ref({
+     global: false,
+     page: false,
+   })
+   
+   // å…¨å±€é”™è¯¯çŠ¶æ€
+   const errors = ref([])
+   
+   // é€šçŸ¥çŠ¶æ€
+   const notifications = ref([])
+   const unreadCount = computed(() => 
+     notifications.value.filter(n => !n.read).length
+   )
+   
+   // è·¯ç”±çŠ¶æ€
+   const currentRoute = ref('')
+   const breadcrumbs = ref([])
+   
+   // ===== è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ =====
+   
+   // å½“å‰é¡µé¢æ ‡é¢˜
+   const currentPageTitle = computed(() => {
+     const routeMap = {
+       '/': 'æ–°é—»æ¦‚è§ˆ',
+       '/news': 'æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨',
+       '/crawler': 'çˆ¬è™«ç®¡ç†',
+       '/stats': 'æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡',
+       '/settings': 'ç³»ç»Ÿè®¾ç½®',
+     }
+     return routeMap[currentRoute.value] || 'æ–°é—»ç³»ç»Ÿ'
+   })
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦å¤„äºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   const isLoading = computed(() => 
+     Object.values(loading.value).some(Boolean)
+   )
+   
+   // ===== æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³• =====
+   
+   // ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢
+   const toggleTheme = () => {
+     isDark.value = !isDark.value
+   }
+   
+   const setTheme = (dark) => {
+     isDark.value = dark
+   }
+   
+   // ä¾§è¾¹æ æ§åˆ¶
+   const toggleSidebar = () => {
+     sidebarCollapsed.value = !sidebarCollapsed.value
+   }
+   
+   const setSidebarCollapsed = (collapsed) => {
+     sidebarCollapsed.value = collapsed
+   }
+   
+   // è®¾ç½®é¢æ¿æ§åˆ¶
+   const toggleSettings = () => {
+     showSettings.value = !showSettings.value
+   }
+   
+   const closeSettings = () => {
+     showSettings.value = false
+   }
+   
+   // é€šçŸ¥é¢æ¿æ§åˆ¶
+   const toggleNotifications = () => {
+     showNotifications.value = !showNotifications.value
+   }
+   
+   const closeNotifications = () => {
+     showNotifications.value = false
+   }
+   
+   // é…ç½®æ›´æ–°
+   const updateConfig = (newConfig) => {
+     config.value = { ...config.value, ...newConfig }
+   }
+   
+   const resetConfig = () => {
+     config.value = {
+       language: 'zh-CN',
+       autoRefresh: true,
+       refreshInterval: 30000,
+       pageSize: 20,
+       timeFormat: 'relative',
+       enableAnimation: true,
+       enableSound: false,
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
+   const setLoading = (key, value) => {
+     loading.value[key] = value
+   }
+   
+   const setGlobalLoading = (value) => {
+     loading.value.global = value
+   }
+   
+   const setPageLoading = (value) => {
+     loading.value.page = value
+   }
+   
+   // é”™è¯¯ç®¡ç†
+   const addError = (error) => {
+     const errorItem = {
+       id: Date.now(),
+       message: error.message || error,
+       type: error.type || 'error',
+       timestamp: new Date(),
+       stack: error.stack,
+     }
+     errors.value.unshift(errorItem)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶é”™è¯¯æ•°é‡ï¼Œé¿å…å†…å­˜æ³„æ¼
+     if (errors.value.length > 50) {
+       errors.value = errors.value.slice(0, 50)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const removeError = (id) => {
+     const index = errors.value.findIndex(e => e.id === id)
+     if (index > -1) {
+       errors.value.splice(index, 1)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const clearErrors = () => {
+     errors.value = []
+   }
+   
+   // é€šçŸ¥ç®¡ç†
+   const addNotification = (notification) => {
+     const notificationItem = {
+       id: Date.now(),
+       title: notification.title,
+       message: notification.message,
+       type: notification.type || 'info',
+       read: false,
+       timestamp: new Date(),
+       action: notification.action,
+     }
+     notifications.value.unshift(notificationItem)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶é€šçŸ¥æ•°é‡
+     if (notifications.value.length > 100) {
+       notifications.value = notifications.value.slice(0, 100)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const markNotificationRead = (id) => {
+     const notification = notifications.value.find(n => n.id === id)
+     if (notification) {
+       notification.read = true
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const markAllNotificationsRead = () => {
+     notifications.value.forEach(n => n.read = true)
+   }
+   
+   const removeNotification = (id) => {
+     const index = notifications.value.findIndex(n => n.id === id)
+     if (index > -1) {
+       notifications.value.splice(index, 1)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const clearNotifications = () => {
+     notifications.value = []
+   }
+   
+   // è·¯ç”±çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
+   const setCurrentRoute = (route) => {
+     currentRoute.value = route
+   }
+   
+   const setBreadcrumbs = (crumbs) => {
+     breadcrumbs.value = crumbs
+   }
+   
+   // åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–
+   const initApp = async () => {
+     try {
+       setGlobalLoading(true)
+       
+       // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–é€»è¾‘
+       // æ¯”å¦‚æ£€æŸ¥ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€ã€åŠ è½½ç”¨æˆ·é…ç½®ç­‰
+       
+       console.log('åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ')
+     } catch (error) {
+       addError(error)
+       console.error('åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     } finally {
+       setGlobalLoading(false)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     isDark,
+     theme,
+     sidebarCollapsed,
+     showSettings,
+     showNotifications,
+     config,
+     loading,
+     errors,
+     notifications,
+     currentRoute,
+     breadcrumbs,
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+     currentPageTitle,
+     unreadCount,
+     isLoading,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     toggleTheme,
+     setTheme,
+     toggleSidebar,
+     setSidebarCollapsed,
+     toggleSettings,
+     closeSettings,
+     toggleNotifications,
+     closeNotifications,
+     updateConfig,
+     resetConfig,
+     setLoading,
+     setGlobalLoading,
+     setPageLoading,
+     addError,
+     removeError,
+     clearErrors,
+     addNotification,
+     markNotificationRead,
+     markAllNotificationsRead,
+     removeNotification,
+     clearNotifications,
+     setCurrentRoute,
+     setBreadcrumbs,
+     initApp,
+   }
+ }, {
+   persist: {
+     key: 'newslook-app',
+     storage: localStorage,
+     paths: ['isDark', 'sidebarCollapsed', 'config'],
+   },
+ }) 
```

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { newsApi } from '../../api'
+ import { useAppStore } from './app'
+ 
+ export const useNewsStore = defineStore('news', () => {
+   // ===== çŠ¶æ€å®šä¹‰ =====
+   
+   // æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®
+   const newsList = ref([])
+   const currentNews = ref(null)
+   const totalCount = ref(0)
+   const currentPage = ref(1)
+   
+   // ç­›é€‰å’Œæœç´¢
+   const filters = ref({
+     source: '',
+     category: '',
+     startDate: '',
+     endDate: '',
+     keyword: '',
+   })
+   
+   const searchQuery = ref('')
+   const searchResults = ref([])
+   const searchTotalCount = ref(0)
+   
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   const loading = ref({
+     list: false,
+     detail: false,
+     search: false,
+     stats: false,
+   })
+   
+   // ç¼“å­˜æ•°æ®
+   const sources = ref([])
+   const categories = ref([])
+   const hotKeywords = ref([])
+   const stats = ref({
+     total: 0,
+     today: 0,
+     sources: {},
+     trends: [],
+   })
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·åå¥½
+   const preferences = ref({
+     viewMode: 'list', // 'list' | 'card' | 'compact'
+     sortBy: 'pub_time', // 'pub_time' | 'crawl_time' | 'title'
+     sortOrder: 'desc', // 'asc' | 'desc'
+     pageSize: 20,
+     autoRefresh: false,
+     refreshInterval: 60000, // 1åˆ†é’Ÿ
+   })
+   
+   // ===== è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ =====
+   
+   // è¿‡æ»¤åçš„æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨
+   const filteredNews = computed(() => {
+     let filtered = newsList.value
+     
+     if (filters.value.source) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(news => news.source === filters.value.source)
+     }
+     
+     if (filters.value.category) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(news => news.category === filters.value.category)
+     }
+     
+     if (filters.value.keyword) {
+       const keyword = filters.value.keyword.toLowerCase()
+       filtered = filtered.filter(news => 
+         news.title.toLowerCase().includes(keyword) ||
+         news.content.toLowerCase().includes(keyword)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     if (filters.value.startDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(news => 
+         new Date(news.pub_time) >= new Date(filters.value.startDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     if (filters.value.endDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(news => 
+         new Date(news.pub_time) <= new Date(filters.value.endDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     return filtered
+   })
+   
+   // æ–°é—»æ•°é‡ç»Ÿè®¡
+   const newsCount = computed(() => ({
+     total: newsList.value.length,
+     filtered: filteredNews.value.length,
+     today: newsList.value.filter(news => {
+       const today = new Date().toDateString()
+       return new Date(news.pub_time).toDateString() === today
+     }).length,
+   }))
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ›´å¤šæ•°æ®
+   const hasMore = computed(() => {
+     return newsList.value.length < totalCount.value
+   })
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦æ­£åœ¨åŠ è½½
+   const isLoading = computed(() => {
+     return Object.values(loading.value).some(Boolean)
+   })
+   
+   // ===== æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³• =====
+   
+   // è·å–æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨
+   const fetchNewsList = async (params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.list = true
+       
+       const requestParams = {
+         page: currentPage.value,
+         page_size: preferences.value.pageSize,
+         sort_by: preferences.value.sortBy,
+         sort_order: preferences.value.sortOrder,
+         ...filters.value,
+         ...params,
+       }
+       
+       const response = await newsApi.getNewsList(requestParams)
+       
+       if (params.append) {
+         // è¿½åŠ æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆåˆ†é¡µåŠ è½½ï¼‰
+         newsList.value.push(...response.data)
+       } else {
+         // æ›¿æ¢æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆåˆ·æ–°ï¼‰
+         newsList.value = response.data
+         currentPage.value = 1
+       }
+       
+       totalCount.value = response.total || response.count || 0
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.list = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åŠ è½½æ›´å¤šæ–°é—»
+   const loadMore = async () => {
+     if (hasMore.value && !loading.value.list) {
+       currentPage.value += 1
+       await fetchNewsList({ append: true })
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åˆ·æ–°æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨
+   const refreshNewsList = async () => {
+     currentPage.value = 1
+     await fetchNewsList()
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…
+   const fetchNewsDetail = async (id) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.detail = true
+       
+       const response = await newsApi.getNewsDetail(id)
+       currentNews.value = response.data || response
+       
+       return currentNews.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.detail = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æœç´¢æ–°é—»
+   const searchNews = async (query, params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.search = true
+       searchQuery.value = query
+       
+       const response = await newsApi.searchNews(query, params)
+       searchResults.value = response.data || response.results || []
+       searchTotalCount.value = response.total || response.count || 0
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.search = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç©ºæœç´¢ç»“æœ
+   const clearSearch = () => {
+     searchQuery.value = ''
+     searchResults.value = []
+     searchTotalCount.value = 0
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
+   const fetchStats = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.stats = true
+       
+       const response = await newsApi.getStats()
+       stats.value = response.data || response
+       
+       return stats.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.stats = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–æ–°é—»æ¥æºåˆ—è¡¨
+   const fetchSources = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await newsApi.getSources()
+       sources.value = response.data || response || []
+       return sources.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn('è·å–æ–°é—»æ¥æºå¤±è´¥:', error)
+       return []
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–æ–°é—»åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨
+   const fetchCategories = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await newsApi.getCategories()
+       categories.value = response.data || response || []
+       return categories.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn('è·å–æ–°é—»åˆ†ç±»å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       return []
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–çƒ­é—¨å…³é”®è¯
+   const fetchHotKeywords = async (params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await newsApi.getHotKeywords(params)
+       hotKeywords.value = response.data || response || []
+       return hotKeywords.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn('è·å–çƒ­é—¨å…³é”®è¯å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       return []
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç­›é€‰å™¨æ“ä½œ
+   const setFilter = (key, value) => {
+     filters.value[key] = value
+   }
+   
+   const updateFilters = (newFilters) => {
+     filters.value = { ...filters.value, ...newFilters }
+   }
+   
+   const resetFilters = () => {
+     filters.value = {
+       source: '',
+       category: '',
+       startDate: '',
+       endDate: '',
+       keyword: '',
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åå¥½è®¾ç½®
+   const updatePreferences = (newPreferences) => {
+     preferences.value = { ...preferences.value, ...newPreferences }
+   }
+   
+   const setViewMode = (mode) => {
+     preferences.value.viewMode = mode
+   }
+   
+   const setSortBy = (sortBy, sortOrder = 'desc') => {
+     preferences.value.sortBy = sortBy
+     preferences.value.sortOrder = sortOrder
+   }
+   
+   const setPageSize = (size) => {
+     preferences.value.pageSize = size
+   }
+   
+   // è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°æ§åˆ¶
+   let refreshTimer = null
+   
+   const startAutoRefresh = () => {
+     if (refreshTimer) {
+       clearInterval(refreshTimer)
+     }
+     
+     if (preferences.value.autoRefresh) {
+       refreshTimer = setInterval(() => {
+         refreshNewsList().catch(console.error)
+       }, preferences.value.refreshInterval)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   const stopAutoRefresh = () => {
+     if (refreshTimer) {
+       clearInterval(refreshTimer)
+       refreshTimer = null
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ•°æ®åˆå§‹åŒ–
+   const initNewsData = async () => {
+     try {
+       // å¹¶è¡ŒåŠ è½½åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®
+       const promises = [
+         fetchSources(),
+         fetchCategories(),
+         fetchHotKeywords(),
+         fetchStats(),
+       ]
+       
+       await Promise.allSettled(promises)
+       
+       // åŠ è½½æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨
+       await fetchNewsList()
+       
+       // å¯åŠ¨è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°
+       if (preferences.value.autoRefresh) {
+         startAutoRefresh()
+       }
+       
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+   const cleanup = () => {
+     stopAutoRefresh()
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     newsList,
+     currentNews,
+     totalCount,
+     currentPage,
+     filters,
+     searchQuery,
+     searchResults,
+     searchTotalCount,
+     loading,
+     sources,
+     categories,
+     hotKeywords,
+     stats,
+     preferences,
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+     filteredNews,
+     newsCount,
+     hasMore,
+     isLoading,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     fetchNewsList,
+     loadMore,
+     refreshNewsList,
+     fetchNewsDetail,
+     searchNews,
+     clearSearch,
+     fetchStats,
+     fetchSources,
+     fetchCategories,
+     fetchHotKeywords,
+     setFilter,
+     updateFilters,
+     resetFilters,
+     updatePreferences,
+     setViewMode,
+     setSortBy,
+     setPageSize,
+     startAutoRefresh,
+     stopAutoRefresh,
+     initNewsData,
+     cleanup,
+   }
+ }, {
+   persist: {
+     key: 'newslook-news',
+     storage: localStorage,
+     paths: ['preferences', 'filters'],
+   },
+ }) 
```

+ export const useCrawlerStore = defineStore('crawler', () => {

+

+       .map(([source]) => source)
+   })

+   const filteredLogs = computed(() => {

+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.source) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => log.source === logFilters.value.source)
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.startDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => 
+         new Date(log.timestamp) >= new Date(logFilters.value.startDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.endDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => 
+         new Date(log.timestamp) <= new Date(logFilters.value.endDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     return filtered
+   })
+   
+   // çˆ¬è™«æ€§èƒ½æŒ‡æ ‡
+   const performanceMetrics = computed(() => {
+     const sources = Object.values(crawlerStatus.value.sources || {})
+     
+     return {
+       successRate: sources.length > 0 
+         ? (sources.filter(s => s.status === 'success').length / sources.length * 100).toFixed(1)
+         : 0,
+       avgSpeed: stats.value.performance.avgTime || 0,
+       totalCrawled: stats.value.total.crawled || 0,

+     return Object.values(crawlerStatus.value.sources || {})

+   
+   // è·å–çˆ¬è™«çŠ¶æ€
+   const fetchStatus = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.status = true
+       
+       const response = await crawlerApi.getStatus()
+       crawlerStatus.value = response.data || response
+       
+       return crawlerStatus.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.status = false
+     }
+   }

+       // è®°å½•æ“ä½œå†å²
+       addOperationHistory('start', sources, true)
+       
+       // åˆ·æ–°çŠ¶æ€

+       const appStore = useAppStore()

+         title: 'çˆ¬è™«å¯åŠ¨',

+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       
+       // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æ“ä½œ
+       addOperationHistory('start', sources, false, error.message)

+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.operation = false
+     }
+   }

+       // è®°å½•æ“ä½œå†å²

+       
+       // åˆ·æ–°çŠ¶æ€

+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'çˆ¬è™«åœæ­¢',
+         message: sources.length > 0 
+           ? `å·²åœæ­¢ ${sources.join(', ')} çˆ¬è™«`
+           : 'å·²åœæ­¢æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¬è™«',
+         type: 'warning',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)

+       // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æ“ä½œ

+       loading.value.operation = false

+       loading.value.operation = false

+       loading.value.stats = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–çˆ¬è™«æ—¥å¿—
+   const fetchLogs = async (params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.logs = true
+       
+       const response = await crawlerApi.getLogs(params)
+       
+       if (params.append) {
+         logs.value.push(...(response.data || response.logs || []))
+       } else {
+         logs.value = response.data || response.logs || []
+       }
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.logs = false
+     }

+   // æ¸…ç©ºæ—¥å¿—
+   const clearLogs = () => {
+     logs.value = []
+   }
+   
+   // è®¾ç½®æ—¥å¿—ç­›é€‰
+   const setLogFilter = (key, value) => {
+     logFilters.value[key] = value
+   }
+   
+   const resetLogFilters = () => {
+     logFilters.value = {
+       level: '',
+       source: '',
+       startDate: '',
+       endDate: '',
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œå†å²è®°å½•
+   const addOperationHistory = (operation, sources, success, error = null) => {
+     const record = {
+       id: Date.now(),
+       operation,
+       sources: [...sources],
+       success,
+       error,
+       timestamp: new Date(),
+     }
+     
+     operationHistory.value.unshift(record)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶å†å²è®°å½•æ•°é‡
+     if (operationHistory.value.length > 100) {
+       operationHistory.value = operationHistory.value.slice(0, 100)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç©ºæ“ä½œå†å²
+   const clearOperationHistory = () => {
+     operationHistory.value = []
+   }
+

+   let statusTimer = null
+   
+   const startStatusPolling = (interval = 5000) => {
+     if (statusTimer) {
+       clearInterval(statusTimer)
+     }
+

+     }, interval)
+   }
+

+       statusTimer = null
+     }
+   }

+       appStore.addError(error)

+     cleanup,
+   }
+ }, {
+   persist: {
+     key: 'newslook-crawler',
+     storage: localStorage,
+     paths: ['logFilters'],
+   },
+ })

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { userApi } from '../../api'
+ import { useAppStore } from './app'
+ 
+ export const useUserStore = defineStore('user', () => {
+   // ===== çŠ¶æ€å®šä¹‰ =====
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+   const userInfo = ref({
+     id: null,
+     username: '',
+     email: '',
+     avatar: '',
+     role: 'user',
+     lastLogin: null,
+     createdAt: null,
+   })
+   
+   // è®¤è¯çŠ¶æ€
+   const isLoggedIn = ref(false)
+   const token = ref('')
+   const refreshToken = ref('')
+   const tokenExpiry = ref(null)
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®
+   const settings = ref({
+     notifications: {
+       email: true,
+       browser: true,
+       sound: false,
+       crawlerStatus: true,
+       newsAlerts: false,
+     },
+     dashboard: {
+       defaultView: 'overview',
+       refreshInterval: 30000,
+       showWelcome: true,
+       compactMode: false,
+     },
+     privacy: {
+       profileVisible: false,
+       activityTracking: true,
+       analyticsOptIn: false,
+     },
+   })
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·åå¥½
+   const preferences = ref({
+     favoriteNews: [],
+     readHistory: [],
+     bookmarks: [],
+     tags: [],
+   })
+   
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   const loading = ref({
+     login: false,
+     logout: false,
+     profile: false,
+     settings: false,
+   })
+   
+   // ===== è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ =====
+   
+   // æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç®¡ç†å‘˜
+   const isAdmin = computed(() => {
+     return userInfo.value.role === 'admin'
+   })
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¾ç¤ºå
+   const displayName = computed(() => {
+     return userInfo.value.username || userInfo.value.email || 'ç”¨æˆ·'
+   })
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·å¤´åƒURL
+   const avatarUrl = computed(() => {
+     if (userInfo.value.avatar) {
+       return userInfo.value.avatar
+     }
+     // ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å¤´åƒæˆ–ç”Ÿæˆå­—æ¯å¤´åƒ
+     const firstLetter = displayName.value.charAt(0).toUpperCase()
+     return `https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=${firstLetter}&background=667eea&color=fff&size=40`
+   })
+   
+   // Tokenæ˜¯å¦å³å°†è¿‡æœŸ
+   const isTokenExpiring = computed(() => {
+     if (!tokenExpiry.value) return false
+     const now = Date.now()
+     const expiry = new Date(tokenExpiry.value).getTime()
+     return expiry - now < 5 * 60 * 1000 // 5åˆ†é’Ÿå†…è¿‡æœŸ
+   })
+   
+   // æ”¶è—æ–°é—»æ•°é‡
+   const favoriteCount = computed(() => {
+     return preferences.value.favoriteNews.length
+   })
+   
+   // é˜…è¯»å†å²æ•°é‡
+   const readHistoryCount = computed(() => {
+     return preferences.value.readHistory.length
+   })
+   
+   // ===== æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³• =====
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•
+   const login = async (credentials) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.login = true
+       
+       const response = await userApi.login(credentials)
+       
+       // æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€
+       token.value = response.token || response.access_token
+       refreshToken.value = response.refresh_token || ''
+       tokenExpiry.value = response.expires_at || new Date(Date.now() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
+       userInfo.value = response.user || response.userInfo || {}
+       isLoggedIn.value = true
+       
+       // å­˜å‚¨tokenåˆ°localStorage
+       localStorage.setItem('token', token.value)
+       if (refreshToken.value) {
+         localStorage.setItem('refreshToken', refreshToken.value)
+       }
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ',
+         message: `æ¬¢è¿å›æ¥ï¼Œ${displayName.value}ï¼`,
+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.login = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å‡º
+   const logout = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.logout = true
+       
+       // è°ƒç”¨ç™»å‡ºAPI
+       if (token.value) {
+         await userApi.logout().catch(console.warn)
+       }
+       
+       // æ¸…ç©ºç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€
+       userInfo.value = {
+         id: null,
+         username: '',
+         email: '',
+         avatar: '',
+         role: 'user',
+         lastLogin: null,
+         createdAt: null,
+       }
+       isLoggedIn.value = false
+       token.value = ''
+       refreshToken.value = ''
+       tokenExpiry.value = null
+       
+       // æ¸…é™¤æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨
+       localStorage.removeItem('token')
+       localStorage.removeItem('refreshToken')
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'ç™»å‡ºæˆåŠŸ',
+         message: 'æ‚¨å·²å®‰å…¨ç™»å‡ºç³»ç»Ÿ',
+         type: 'info',
+       })
+       
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.logout = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åˆ·æ–°Token
+   const refreshUserToken = async () => {
+     try {
+       if (!refreshToken.value) {
+         throw new Error('æ²¡æœ‰åˆ·æ–°ä»¤ç‰Œ')
+       }
+       
+       const response = await userApi.refreshToken(refreshToken.value)
+       
+       token.value = response.token || response.access_token
+       tokenExpiry.value = response.expires_at || new Date(Date.now() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
+       
+       localStorage.setItem('token', token.value)
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       // åˆ·æ–°å¤±è´¥ï¼Œéœ€è¦é‡æ–°ç™»å½•
+       await logout()
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+   const fetchUserInfo = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.profile = true
+       
+       const response = await userApi.getUserInfo()
+       userInfo.value = { ...userInfo.value, ...(response.data || response) }
+       
+       return userInfo.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.profile = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®
+   const updateSettings = async (newSettings) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.settings = true
+       
+       const response = await userApi.updateSettings(newSettings)
+       settings.value = { ...settings.value, ...newSettings }
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'è®¾ç½®å·²ä¿å­˜',
+         message: 'æ‚¨çš„è®¾ç½®å·²æˆåŠŸæ›´æ–°',
+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.settings = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®
+   const fetchSettings = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await userApi.getSettings()
+       settings.value = { ...settings.value, ...(response.data || response) }
+       
+       return settings.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       return settings.value
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ æ”¶è—æ–°é—»
+   const addFavorite = (newsId) => {
+     if (!preferences.value.favoriteNews.includes(newsId)) {
+       preferences.value.favoriteNews.unshift(newsId)
+       
+       // é™åˆ¶æ”¶è—æ•°é‡
+       if (preferences.value.favoriteNews.length > 500) {
+         preferences.value.favoriteNews = preferences.value.favoriteNews.slice(0, 500)
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç§»é™¤æ”¶è—æ–°é—»
+   const removeFavorite = (newsId) => {
+     const index = preferences.value.favoriteNews.indexOf(newsId)
+     if (index > -1) {
+       preferences.value.favoriteNews.splice(index, 1)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ”¶è—
+   const isFavorite = (newsId) => {
+     return preferences.value.favoriteNews.includes(newsId)
+   }
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ é˜…è¯»å†å²
+   const addToReadHistory = (newsId) => {
+     // ç§»é™¤å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„è®°å½•
+     const index = preferences.value.readHistory.indexOf(newsId)
+     if (index > -1) {
+       preferences.value.readHistory.splice(index, 1)
+     }
+     
+     // æ·»åŠ åˆ°å¼€å¤´
+     preferences.value.readHistory.unshift(newsId)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶å†å²æ•°é‡
+     if (preferences.value.readHistory.length > 1000) {
+       preferences.value.readHistory = preferences.value.readHistory.slice(0, 1000)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç©ºé˜…è¯»å†å²
+   const clearReadHistory = () => {
+     preferences.value.readHistory = []
+   }
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ ä¹¦ç­¾
+   const addBookmark = (bookmark) => {
+     const existingIndex = preferences.value.bookmarks.findIndex(b => b.id === bookmark.id)
+     if (existingIndex === -1) {
+       preferences.value.bookmarks.unshift({
+         ...bookmark,
+         addedAt: new Date(),
+       })
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç§»é™¤ä¹¦ç­¾
+   const removeBookmark = (bookmarkId) => {
+     const index = preferences.value.bookmarks.findIndex(b => b.id === bookmarkId)
+     if (index > -1) {
+       preferences.value.bookmarks.splice(index, 1)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è‡ªåŠ¨ç™»å½•æ£€æŸ¥
+   const checkAutoLogin = async () => {
+     const savedToken = localStorage.getItem('token')
+     const savedRefreshToken = localStorage.getItem('refreshToken')
+     
+     if (savedToken) {
+       token.value = savedToken
+       refreshToken.value = savedRefreshToken || ''
+       isLoggedIn.value = true
+       
+       try {
+         // éªŒè¯tokenæœ‰æ•ˆæ€§å¹¶è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
+         await fetchUserInfo()
+         
+         // å¦‚æœtokenå³å°†è¿‡æœŸï¼Œå°è¯•åˆ·æ–°
+         if (isTokenExpiring.value && refreshToken.value) {
+           await refreshUserToken()
+         }
+         
+       } catch (error) {
+         // Tokenæ— æ•ˆï¼Œæ¸…é™¤ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€
+         await logout()
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®åˆå§‹åŒ–
+   const initUserData = async () => {
+     try {
+       // æ£€æŸ¥è‡ªåŠ¨ç™»å½•
+       await checkAutoLogin()
+       
+       // å¦‚æœå·²ç™»å½•ï¼ŒåŠ è½½ç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®
+       if (isLoggedIn.value) {
+         await fetchSettings()
+       }
+       
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn('ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // Tokenè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°
+   let refreshTimer = null
+   
+   const startTokenRefresh = () => {
+     if (refreshTimer) {
+       clearInterval(refreshTimer)
+     }
+     
+     // æ¯10åˆ†é’Ÿæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡tokençŠ¶æ€
+     refreshTimer = setInterval(async () => {
+       if (isLoggedIn.value && isTokenExpiring.value && refreshToken.value) {
+         try {
+           await refreshUserToken()
+         } catch (error) {
+           console.error('è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°tokenå¤±è´¥:', error)
+         }
+       }
+     }, 10 * 60 * 1000)
+   }
+   
+   const stopTokenRefresh = () => {
+     if (refreshTimer) {
+       clearInterval(refreshTimer)
+       refreshTimer = null
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç†èµ„æº
+   const cleanup = () => {
+     stopTokenRefresh()
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     userInfo,
+     isLoggedIn,
+     token,
+     settings,
+     preferences,
+     loading,
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+     isAdmin,
+     displayName,
+     avatarUrl,
+     isTokenExpiring,
+     favoriteCount,
+     readHistoryCount,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     login,
+     logout,
+     refreshUserToken,
+     fetchUserInfo,
+     updateSettings,
+     fetchSettings,
+     addFavorite,
+     removeFavorite,
+     isFavorite,
+     addToReadHistory,
+     clearReadHistory,
+     addBookmark,
+     removeBookmark,
+     checkAutoLogin,
+     initUserData,
+     startTokenRefresh,
+     stopTokenRefresh,
+     cleanup,
+   }
+ }, {
+   persist: {
+     key: 'newslook-user',
+     storage: localStorage,
+     paths: ['settings', 'preferences'],
+   },
+ }) 
```

```diff

+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { systemApi } from '../../api'
+ import { useAppStore } from './app'

+ export const useSystemStore = defineStore('system', () => {
+   // ===== çŠ¶æ€å®šä¹‰ =====
+   
+   // ç³»ç»Ÿä¿¡æ¯
+   const systemInfo = ref({
+     version: '2.0.0',
+     buildTime: '',
+     platform: '',
+     pythonVersion: '',
+     dependencies: {},
+     uptime: 0,
+   })
+   
+   // ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€
+   const systemStatus = ref({
+     health: 'unknown', // 'healthy' | 'warning' | 'error' | 'unknown'
+     cpu: {
+       usage: 0,
+       cores: 0,
+     },
+     memory: {
+       total: 0,
+       used: 0,
+       available: 0,
+       percent: 0,
+     },
+     disk: {
+       total: 0,
+       used: 0,
+       free: 0,
+       percent: 0,
+     },
+     network: {
+       bytesReceived: 0,
+       bytesSent: 0,
+       packetsReceived: 0,
+       packetsSent: 0,
+     },
+     database: {
+       connected: false,
+       size: 0,
+       tables: 0,
+       lastBackup: null,
+     },
+   })
+   
+   // ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¥å¿—
+   const logs = ref([])
+   const logFilters = ref({
+     level: '',
+     module: '',
+     startDate: '',
+     endDate: '',
+     keyword: '',
+   })
+   
+   // æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®
+   const performanceData = ref({
+     cpu: [],
+     memory: [],
+     network: [],
+     requests: [],
+     responseTime: [],
+   })
+   
+   // å¤‡ä»½å’Œç»´æŠ¤
+   const maintenance = ref({
+     lastBackup: null,
+     nextBackup: null,
+     backupSize: 0,
+     backupCount: 0,
+     cleanupSchedule: '0 2 * * 0', // æ¯å‘¨æ—¥å‡Œæ™¨2ç‚¹
+     lastCleanup: null,
+   })
+   
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   const loading = ref({
+     info: false,
+     status: false,
+     logs: false,
+     backup: false,
+     cleanup: false,
+   })
+   
+   // æ“ä½œå†å²
+   const operationHistory = ref([])
+   
+   // ===== è®¡ç®—å±æ€§ =====
+   
+   // ç³»ç»Ÿå¥åº·çŠ¶æ€
+   const healthStatus = computed(() => {
+     const status = systemStatus.value
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥å„é¡¹æŒ‡æ ‡
+     const cpuHigh = status.cpu.usage > 80
+     const memoryHigh = status.memory.percent > 85
+     const diskHigh = status.disk.percent > 90
+     const dbDisconnected = !status.database.connected
+     
+     if (dbDisconnected) {
+       return { status: 'error', message: 'æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¼‚å¸¸' }
+     } else if (diskHigh) {
+       return { status: 'error', message: 'ç£ç›˜ç©ºé—´ä¸è¶³' }
+     } else if (cpuHigh || memoryHigh) {
+       return { status: 'warning', message: 'ç³»ç»Ÿèµ„æºä½¿ç”¨ç‡è¿‡é«˜' }
+     } else {
+       return { status: 'healthy', message: 'ç³»ç»Ÿè¿è¡Œæ­£å¸¸' }
+     }
+   })
+   
+   // è¿‡æ»¤åçš„æ—¥å¿—
+   const filteredLogs = computed(() => {
+     let filtered = logs.value
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.level) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => log.level === logFilters.value.level)
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.module) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => log.module === logFilters.value.module)
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.keyword) {
+       const keyword = logFilters.value.keyword.toLowerCase()
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => 
+         log.message.toLowerCase().includes(keyword)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.startDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => 
+         new Date(log.timestamp) >= new Date(logFilters.value.startDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     if (logFilters.value.endDate) {
+       filtered = filtered.filter(log => 
+         new Date(log.timestamp) <= new Date(logFilters.value.endDate)
+       )
+     }
+     
+     return filtered
+   })
+   
+   // æ€§èƒ½è¶‹åŠ¿
+   const performanceTrend = computed(() => {
+     const recentData = performanceData.value.cpu.slice(-10) // æœ€è¿‘10ä¸ªæ•°æ®ç‚¹
+     
+     if (recentData.length < 2) return 'stable'
+     
+     const trend = recentData[recentData.length - 1] - recentData[0]
+     
+     if (trend > 10) return 'increasing'
+     if (trend < -10) return 'decreasing'
+     return 'stable'
+   })
+   
+   // å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡
+   const memoryUsagePercent = computed(() => {
+     const memory = systemStatus.value.memory
+     return memory.total > 0 ? Math.round((memory.used / memory.total) * 100) : 0
+   })
+   
+   // ç£ç›˜ä½¿ç”¨ç‡
+   const diskUsagePercent = computed(() => {
+     const disk = systemStatus.value.disk
+     return disk.total > 0 ? Math.round((disk.used / disk.total) * 100) : 0
+   })
+   
+   // ===== æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³• =====
+   
+   // è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿä¿¡æ¯
+   const fetchSystemInfo = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.info = true
+       
+       const response = await systemApi.getInfo()
+       systemInfo.value = { ...systemInfo.value, ...(response.data || response) }
+       
+       return systemInfo.value
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.info = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€

+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.status = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§æ•°æ®
+   const updatePerformanceData = (status) => {
+     const timestamp = Date.now()
+     
+     // CPUæ•°æ®
+     performanceData.value.cpu.push({
+       timestamp,
+       value: status.cpu?.usage || 0,
+     })
+     
+     // å†…å­˜æ•°æ®
+     performanceData.value.memory.push({
+       timestamp,
+       value: status.memory?.percent || 0,
+     })
+     
+     // ç½‘ç»œæ•°æ®
+     performanceData.value.network.push({
+       timestamp,
+       received: status.network?.bytesReceived || 0,
+       sent: status.network?.bytesSent || 0,
+     })
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶æ•°æ®ç‚¹æ•°é‡ï¼Œé¿å…å†…å­˜æ³„æ¼
+     const maxPoints = 100
+     Object.keys(performanceData.value).forEach(key => {
+       if (performanceData.value[key].length > maxPoints) {
+         performanceData.value[key] = performanceData.value[key].slice(-maxPoints)
+       }
+     })
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¥å¿—
+   const fetchLogs = async (params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.logs = true
+       
+       const response = await systemApi.getLogs(params)
+       
+       if (params.append) {
+         logs.value.push(...(response.data || response.logs || []))
+       } else {
+         logs.value = response.data || response.logs || []
+       }
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.logs = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæ•°æ®
+   const cleanupData = async (options = {}) => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.cleanup = true
+       
+       const response = await systemApi.cleanData(options)
+       
+       // è®°å½•æ“ä½œå†å²
+       addOperationHistory('cleanup', options, true)
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'æ•°æ®æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆ',
+         message: 'ç³»ç»Ÿæ•°æ®æ¸…ç†æ“ä½œå·²æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆ',
+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       // åˆ·æ–°ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€

+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       
+       // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æ“ä½œ
+       addOperationHistory('cleanup', options, false, error.message)
+       
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.cleanup = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // å¯¼å‡ºæ•°æ®
+   const exportData = async (format = 'excel', params = {}) => {
+     try {
+       const response = await systemApi.exportData(format, params)
+       
+       // åˆ›å»ºä¸‹è½½é“¾æ¥
+       const blob = new Blob([response], { type: getContentType(format) })
+       const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob)
+       const a = document.createElement('a')
+       a.href = url
+       a.download = `newslook_export_${new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]}.${format}`
+       document.body.appendChild(a)
+       a.click()
+       document.body.removeChild(a)
+       window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url)
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡º',
+         message: 'æ•°æ®å¯¼å‡ºå·²å¼€å§‹ä¸‹è½½',
+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è·å–æ–‡ä»¶Content-Type
+   const getContentType = (format) => {
+     const types = {
+       excel: 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet',
+       csv: 'text/csv',
+       json: 'application/json',
+       xml: 'application/xml',
+     }
+     return types[format] || 'application/octet-stream'
+   }
+   
+   // å¤‡ä»½æ•°æ®
+   const backupData = async () => {
+     try {
+       loading.value.backup = true
+       
+       const response = await systemApi.backup()
+       
+       // æ›´æ–°å¤‡ä»½ä¿¡æ¯
+       maintenance.value.lastBackup = new Date()
+       maintenance.value.backupCount += 1
+       
+       // è®°å½•æ“ä½œå†å²
+       addOperationHistory('backup', {}, true)
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'æ•°æ®å¤‡ä»½',
+         message: 'æ•°æ®å¤‡ä»½å·²æˆåŠŸåˆ›å»º',
+         type: 'success',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       
+       // è®°å½•å¤±è´¥æ“ä½œ
+       addOperationHistory('backup', {}, false, error.message)
+       
+       throw error
+     } finally {
+       loading.value.backup = false
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // ç³»ç»Ÿé‡å¯
+   const restartSystem = async () => {
+     try {
+       const response = await systemApi.restart()
+       
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addNotification({
+         title: 'ç³»ç»Ÿé‡å¯',
+         message: 'ç³»ç»Ÿæ­£åœ¨é‡å¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¨å€™...',
+         type: 'warning',
+       })
+       
+       return response
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // è®¾ç½®æ—¥å¿—ç­›é€‰
+   const setLogFilter = (key, value) => {
+     logFilters.value[key] = value
+   }
+   
+   const resetLogFilters = () => {
+     logFilters.value = {
+       level: '',
+       module: '',
+       startDate: '',
+       endDate: '',
+       keyword: '',
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç©ºæ—¥å¿—
+   const clearLogs = () => {
+     logs.value = []
+   }
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œå†å²è®°å½•
+   const addOperationHistory = (operation, params, success, error = null) => {
+     const record = {
+       id: Date.now(),
+       operation,
+       params: { ...params },
+       success,
+       error,
+       timestamp: new Date(),
+     }
+     
+     operationHistory.value.unshift(record)
+     
+     // é™åˆ¶å†å²è®°å½•æ•°é‡
+     if (operationHistory.value.length > 50) {
+       operationHistory.value = operationHistory.value.slice(0, 50)
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ¸…ç©ºæ“ä½œå†å²
+   const clearOperationHistory = () => {
+     operationHistory.value = []
+   }
+   
+   // çŠ¶æ€ç›‘æ§è½®è¯¢
+   let monitorTimer = null
+   
+   const startMonitoring = (interval = 10000) => {
+     if (monitorTimer) {
+       clearInterval(monitorTimer)
+     }
+     
+     monitorTimer = setInterval(() => {
+       fetchSystemStatus().catch(console.error)
+     }, interval)
+   }
+   
+   const stopMonitoring = () => {
+     if (monitorTimer) {
+       clearInterval(monitorTimer)
+       monitorTimer = null
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿæ•°æ®
+   const initSystemData = async () => {

+       const promises = [
+         fetchSystemInfo(),
+         fetchSystemStatus(),
+       ]
+       
+       await Promise.allSettled(promises)
+       
+       // å¼€å§‹ç›‘æ§
+       startMonitoring()
+       
+     } catch (error) {
+       const appStore = useAppStore()

+       throw error
+     }

+     stopMonitoring()

+     systemStatus,
+     logs,

+   },

+ æŒ‰åŠŸèƒ½æ¨¡å—åˆ†ç¦»çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œé¿å…å•ä¸ª store è¿‡äºåºå¤§ã€‚
+ 
+ ## æ‰©å±•æŒ‡å—
+ 
+ ### æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ Store æ¨¡å—
+ 
+ 1. åœ¨ `modules/` ç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»ºæ–°æ–‡ä»¶
+ 2. ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†çš„ store ç»“æ„
+ 3. åœ¨ `index.js` ä¸­å¯¼å‡º
+ 4. åœ¨éœ€è¦çš„åœ°æ–¹å¯¼å…¥ä½¿ç”¨
+ 
+ ```javascript
+ // modules/newModule.js
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import { ref } from 'vue'
+ 
+ export const useNewModuleStore = defineStore('newModule', () => {
+   const state = ref({})
+   
+   const actions = () => {
+     // æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     state,
+     actions
+   }
+ }, {
+   persist: {
+     key: 'newslook-new-module',
+     storage: localStorage,
+     paths: ['state']
+   }
+ })
+ ```
+ 
+ ### æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ API
+ 
+ 1. åœ¨ `api/index.js` ä¸­æ·»åŠ æ–°çš„ API åˆ†ç»„
+ 2. åœ¨å¯¹åº”çš„ store ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨
+ 3. æ·»åŠ é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
+ 
+ ```javascript
+ // api/index.js
+ export const newApi = {
+   getData() {
+     return api.get('/new/data')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // store module
+ import { newApi } from '@/api'
+ 
+ const fetchData = async () => {
+   try {
+     const response = await newApi.getData()
+     // å¤„ç†å“åº”
+   } catch (error) {
+     // é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
+   }
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæä¾›äº†å®Œæ•´ã€å¯æ‰©å±•ã€æ˜“ç»´æŠ¤çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œä¸º NewsLook é¡¹ç›®çš„æŒç»­å‘å±•æä¾›äº†åšå®çš„åŸºç¡€ã€‚ 
```

+ /**
+  * Store ç»„åˆå¼å‡½æ•°

+ import { 
+   useAppStore, 
+   useNewsStore, 
+   useCrawlerStore, 
+   useUserStore, 
+   useSystemStore 
+ } from '@/store'
+ 
+ /**
+  * åº”ç”¨ Store ç›¸å…³æ“ä½œ
+  */
+ export function useApp() {
+   const store = useAppStore()
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     theme: store.theme,
+     isDark: store.isDark,
+     isLoading: store.isLoading,
+     currentPageTitle: store.currentPageTitle,
+     sidebarCollapsed: store.sidebarCollapsed,

+ /**

+ /**

+ export function useCrawler() {
+   const store = useCrawlerStore()

+   return {

+     status: store.crawlerStatus,

+     stats: store.stats,

+     updateConfig: store.updateConfig,
+     getLogs: store.fetchLogs,
+     clearLogs: store.clearLogs,
+   }
+ }

+ /**
+  * ç”¨æˆ· Store ç›¸å…³æ“ä½œ
+  */
+ export function useUser() {
+   const store = useUserStore()
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     isLoggedIn: store.isLoggedIn,
+     userInfo: store.userInfo,
+     displayName: store.displayName,
+     avatarUrl: store.avatarUrl,
+     settings: store.settings,
+     favoriteCount: store.favoriteCount,
+     readHistoryCount: store.readHistoryCount,
+     loading: store.loading,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     login: store.login,
+     logout: store.logout,
+     updateSettings: store.updateSettings,
+     addFavorite: store.addFavorite,
+     removeFavorite: store.removeFavorite,

+     addToHistory: store.addToReadHistory,
+     addBookmark: store.addBookmark,

+ /**
+  * ç³»ç»Ÿ Store ç›¸å…³æ“ä½œ
+  */
+ export function useSystem() {
+   const store = useSystemStore()
+   
+   return {
+     // çŠ¶æ€
+     systemInfo: store.systemInfo,
+     systemStatus: store.systemStatus,
+     healthStatus: store.healthStatus,
+     logs: store.logs,
+     loading: store.loading,
+     memoryUsage: store.memoryUsagePercent,
+     diskUsage: store.diskUsagePercent,
+     performanceTrend: store.performanceTrend,
+     
+     // æ–¹æ³•
+     fetchInfo: store.fetchSystemInfo,
+     fetchStatus: store.fetchSystemStatus,
+     getLogs: store.fetchLogs,
+     cleanup: store.cleanupData,
+     backup: store.backupData,
+     exportData: store.exportData,
+     restart: store.restartSystem,
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ç»„åˆå‡½æ•°
+  * æä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–å’Œæ¸…ç†æ–¹æ³•
+  */
+ export function useGlobalState() {
+   const appStore = useAppStore()
+   const userStore = useUserStore()
+   const newsStore = useNewsStore()
+   const crawlerStore = useCrawlerStore()
+   const systemStore = useSystemStore()
+   
+   /**
+    * åˆå§‹åŒ–æ‰€æœ‰å¿…è¦çš„æ•°æ®
+    */
+   const initializeAll = async () => {
+     try {
+       // åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–
+       await appStore.initApp()
+       
+       // ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®åˆå§‹åŒ–
+       await userStore.initUserData()
+       
+       // å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·å·²ç™»å½•ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–å…¶ä»–æ¨¡å—
+       if (userStore.isLoggedIn) {
+         const promises = [
+           newsStore.initNewsData(),
+           crawlerStore.initCrawlerData(),
+           systemStore.initSystemData(),
+         ]
+         
+         await Promise.allSettled(promises)
+         
+         // å¯åŠ¨è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°å’Œç›‘æ§
+         userStore.startTokenRefresh()
+         if (newsStore.preferences.autoRefresh) {
+           newsStore.startAutoRefresh()
+         }
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       appStore.addError(error)
+       throw error
+     }
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * æ¸…ç†æ‰€æœ‰èµ„æº
+    */
+   const cleanupAll = () => {
+     userStore.cleanup()
+     newsStore.cleanup()
+     crawlerStore.cleanup()
+     systemStore.cleanup()
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * é‡ç½®æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
+    */
+   const resetAll = () => {
+     newsStore.resetFilters()
+     appStore.resetConfig()
+     // å…¶ä»–é‡ç½®æ“ä½œ...
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     // å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€
+     isInitialized: appStore.isLoading,
+     hasErrors: () => appStore.errors.length > 0,
+     
+     // å…¨å±€æ–¹æ³•
+     initializeAll,
+     cleanupAll,
+     resetAll,
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ•°æ®åˆ·æ–°ç»„åˆå‡½æ•°
+  */
+ export function useDataRefresh() {
+   const { fetchNews, fetchStats } = useNews()
+   const { fetchStatus } = useCrawler()
+   const { fetchStatus: fetchSystemStatus } = useSystem()
+   
+   /**
+    * åˆ·æ–°æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
+    */
+   const refreshAll = async () => {
+     const promises = [
+       fetchNews(),
+       fetchStats(),
+       fetchStatus(),
+       fetchSystemStatus(),
+     ]
+     
+     return Promise.allSettled(promises)
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * åˆ·æ–°æ–°é—»ç›¸å…³æ•°æ®
+    */
+   const refreshNews = async () => {
+     return Promise.all([
+       fetchNews(),
+       fetchStats(),
+     ])
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * åˆ·æ–°ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€
+    */
+   const refreshSystem = async () => {
+     return Promise.all([
+       fetchStatus(),
+       fetchSystemStatus(),
+     ])
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     refreshAll,
+     refreshNews,
+     refreshSystem,
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * é€šçŸ¥å’Œæ¶ˆæ¯ç»„åˆå‡½æ•°
+  */
+ export function useNotifications() {
+   const { addNotification, addError } = useApp()
+   
+   /**
+    * æ˜¾ç¤ºæˆåŠŸæ¶ˆæ¯
+    */
+   const showSuccess = (message, title = 'æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸ') => {
+     addNotification({
+       title,
+       message,
+       type: 'success'
+     })
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * æ˜¾ç¤ºè­¦å‘Šæ¶ˆæ¯
+    */
+   const showWarning = (message, title = 'æ³¨æ„') => {
+     addNotification({
+       title,
+       message,
+       type: 'warning'
+     })
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯
+    */
+   const showError = (error, title = 'æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥') => {
+     const message = error.message || error
+     addError({ message, type: 'error' })
+     addNotification({
+       title,
+       message,
+       type: 'error'
+     })
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * æ˜¾ç¤ºä¿¡æ¯æ¶ˆæ¯
+    */
+   const showInfo = (message, title = 'æç¤º') => {
+     addNotification({
+       title,
+       message,
+       type: 'info'
+     })
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     showSuccess,
+     showWarning,
+     showError,
+     showInfo,
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * é¡µé¢æƒé™å’Œè·¯ç”±ç›¸å…³
+  */
+ export function usePageAccess() {
+   const { isLoggedIn, userInfo } = useUser()
+   
+   /**
+    * æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰è®¿é—®æƒé™
+    */
+   const hasAccess = (requiredRole = 'user') => {
+     if (!isLoggedIn.value) return false
+     
+     const roleHierarchy = {
+       'user': 1,
+       'admin': 2,
+       'super': 3
+     }
+     
+     const userRole = userInfo.value.role || 'user'
+     return roleHierarchy[userRole] >= roleHierarchy[requiredRole]
+   }
+   
+   /**
+    * æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç®¡ç†å‘˜
+    */
+   const isAdmin = () => hasAccess('admin')
+   
+   /**
+    * éœ€è¦ç™»å½•çš„é¡µé¢å®ˆå«
+    */
+   const requireAuth = () => {
+     if (!isLoggedIn.value) {
+       throw new Error('éœ€è¦ç™»å½•æ‰èƒ½è®¿é—®æ­¤é¡µé¢')
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     hasAccess,
+     isAdmin,
+     requireAuth,
+     isLoggedIn: isLoggedIn.value
+   }
+ } 
```

+ def main():
+     """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
+     cleaner = ProjectCleaner()
+     
+     try:
+         report = cleaner.run_cleanup()
+         print("\n" + "="*60)
+         print("ğŸ‰ æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆ! è¯·æŸ¥çœ‹ CLEANUP_REPORT.md è·å–è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯")
+         print("="*60)
+         
+     except KeyboardInterrupt:
+         print("\nâ¹ï¸  æ¸…ç†è¢«ç”¨æˆ·ä¸­æ–­")
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"\nâŒ æ¸…ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: {e}")
+         logger.error(f"æ¸…ç†å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ """
+ NewsLook é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„é‡æ„è„šæœ¬
+ è§£å†³é‡å¤æ–‡ä»¶å’Œåˆ†æ•£èµ„æºé—®é¢˜
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import shutil
+ import json
+ from pathlib import Path
+ from datetime import datetime
+ 
+ class ProjectRestructurer:
+     def __init__(self, project_root="."):
+         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
+         self.backup_timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
+         self.report = {
+             "restructured_files": [],
+             "consolidated_directories": [],
+             "removed_duplicates": [],
+             "created_directories": [],
+             "updated_imports": []
+         }
+     
+     def create_target_structure(self):
+         """åˆ›å»ºç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•ç»“æ„"""
+         directories_to_create = [
+             # å‰ç«¯èµ„æºç»Ÿä¸€ç®¡ç†
+             "frontend/src/assets",
+             "frontend/src/components", 
+             "frontend/src/views",
+             "frontend/src/store",
+             "frontend/src/utils",
+             "frontend/public",
+             "frontend/dist",
+             
+             # åç«¯èµ„æºæ•´ç†
+             "backend/app/web/static",
+             "backend/app/web/templates", 
+             "backend/app/api",
+             "backend/app/crawlers",
+             "backend/app/utils",
+             "backend/config",
+             
+             # ç»Ÿä¸€å¤‡ä»½ç›®å½•
+             "backup/web_resources",
+             "backup/legacy_files",
+             "backup/duplicate_files",
+             
+             # æ–‡æ¡£å’Œé…ç½®
+             "docs/api",
+             "docs/deployment", 
+             "docs/development",
+             
+             # æ•°æ®å’Œæ—¥å¿—
+             "data/databases",
+             "data/logs",
+             "data/cache",
+             
+             # æµ‹è¯•å’Œç¤ºä¾‹
+             "tests/unit",
+             "tests/integration", 
+             "tests/fixtures",
+             "examples/crawlers",
+             "examples/configs"
+         ]
+         
+         for directory in directories_to_create:
+             target_path = self.project_root / directory
+             if not target_path.exists():
+                 target_path.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                 self.report["created_directories"].append(str(directory))
+                 print(f"âœ… åˆ›å»ºç›®å½•: {directory}")
+     
+     def consolidate_static_resources(self):
+         """æ•´åˆåˆ†æ•£çš„é™æ€èµ„æº"""
+         static_dirs = [
+             "app/web/static",
+             "newslook/web/static", 
+             "src",
+             "public"
+         ]
+         
+         target_static_dir = self.project_root / "frontend/src/assets"
+         
+         for static_dir in static_dirs:
+             source_path = self.project_root / static_dir
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ æ•´åˆé™æ€èµ„æº: {static_dir} -> frontend/src/assets")
+                 
+                 # ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•
+                 for item in source_path.rglob("*"):
+                     if item.is_file() and not item.name.startswith('.'):
+                         relative_path = item.relative_to(source_path)
+                         target_file = target_static_dir / relative_path
+                         
+                         # ç¡®ä¿ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
+                         target_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                         
+                         # å¤„ç†é‡å¤æ–‡ä»¶
+                         if target_file.exists():
+                             backup_file = self.project_root / "backup/duplicate_files" / f"{item.name}_{self.backup_timestamp}"
+                             shutil.copy2(item, backup_file)
+                             self.report["removed_duplicates"].append({
+                                 "original": str(item),
+                                 "backup": str(backup_file)
+                             })
+                         else:
+                             shutil.copy2(item, target_file)
+                             self.report["restructured_files"].append({
+                                 "from": str(item),
+                                 "to": str(target_file)
+                             })
+     
+     def consolidate_templates(self):
+         """æ•´åˆæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         template_dirs = [
+             "app/web/templates",
+             "newslook/web/templates",
+             "frontend/templates"
+         ]
+         
+         target_template_dir = self.project_root / "backend/app/web/templates"
+         
+         for template_dir in template_dirs:
+             source_path = self.project_root / template_dir
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ æ•´åˆæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶: {template_dir} -> backend/app/web/templates")
+                 
+                 for item in source_path.rglob("*.html"):
+                     relative_path = item.relative_to(source_path)
+                     target_file = target_template_dir / relative_path
+                     
+                     target_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                     
+                     if target_file.exists():
+                         # æ¯”è¾ƒæ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸åŒåˆ™å¤‡ä»½
+                         with open(item, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f1, open(target_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f2:
+                             if f1.read() != f2.read():
+                                 backup_file = self.project_root / "backup/duplicate_files" / f"{item.name}_{self.backup_timestamp}"
+                                 shutil.copy2(item, backup_file)
+                                 self.report["removed_duplicates"].append({
+                                     "original": str(item),
+                                     "backup": str(backup_file),
+                                     "reason": "content_differs"
+                                 })
+                     else:
+                         shutil.copy2(item, target_file)
+                         self.report["restructured_files"].append({
+                             "from": str(item),
+                             "to": str(target_file)
+                         })
+     
+     def organize_backend_files(self):
+         """æ•´ç†åç«¯æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         # ç§»åŠ¨ä¸»è¦çš„Pythonæ–‡ä»¶åˆ°backendç›®å½•
+         backend_files = [
+             ("app", "backend/app"),
+             ("newslook", "backend/newslook"), 
+             ("api", "backend/api"),
+             ("utils", "backend/utils"),
+             ("configs", "backend/config")
+         ]
+         
+         for source, target in backend_files:
+             source_path = self.project_root / source
+             target_path = self.project_root / target
+             
+             if source_path.exists() and source != target.split('/')[-1]:
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨åç«¯æ–‡ä»¶: {source} -> {target}")
+                 
+                 if target_path.exists():
+                     # å¤‡ä»½ç°æœ‰ç›®å½•
+                     backup_path = self.project_root / "backup/legacy_files" / f"{source}_{self.backup_timestamp}"
+                     shutil.move(str(target_path), str(backup_path))
+                 
+                 target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                 shutil.move(str(source_path), str(target_path))
+                 
+                 self.report["restructured_files"].append({
+                     "from": str(source_path),
+                     "to": str(target_path)
+                 })
+     
+     def update_import_paths(self):
+         """æ›´æ–°å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„"""
+         # æŸ¥æ‰¾æ‰€æœ‰Pythonæ–‡ä»¶å¹¶æ›´æ–°å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„
+         python_files = list(self.project_root.rglob("*.py"))
+         
+         import_mappings = {
+             "from app.": "from backend.app.",
+             "from newslook.": "from backend.newslook.",
+             "from api.": "from backend.api.", 
+             "from utils.": "from backend.utils.",
+             "import app.": "import backend.app.",
+             "import newslook.": "import backend.newslook.",
+             "import api.": "import backend.api.",
+             "import utils.": "import backend.utils."
+         }
+         
+         updated_files = []
+         
+         for py_file in python_files:
+             try:
+                 with open(py_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                     content = f.read()
+                 
+                 original_content = content
+                 
+                 # åº”ç”¨å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„æ˜ å°„
+                 for old_import, new_import in import_mappings.items():
+                     content = content.replace(old_import, new_import)
+                 
+                 if content != original_content:
+                     with open(py_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                         f.write(content)
+                     updated_files.append(str(py_file))
+                     
+             except Exception as e:
+                 print(f"âš ï¸ æ›´æ–°å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„å¤±è´¥: {py_file} - {e}")
+         
+         self.report["updated_imports"] = updated_files
+         print(f"âœ… æ›´æ–°äº† {len(updated_files)} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶çš„å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„")
+     
+     def create_frontend_config(self):
+         """åˆ›å»ºå‰ç«¯é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         # æ›´æ–°package.jsonè·¯å¾„é…ç½®
+         package_json_path = self.project_root / "frontend/package.json"
+         if package_json_path.exists():
+             with open(package_json_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+                 package_data = json.load(f)

+             # æ›´æ–°è„šæœ¬è·¯å¾„

+                 json.dump(package_data, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)

+     def clean_empty_directories(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†ç©ºç›®å½•"""
+         def remove_empty_dirs(path):
+             if not path.is_dir():
+                 return
+             
+             # é€’å½’æ¸…ç†å­ç›®å½•
+             for subdir in path.iterdir():

+             except OSError:
+                 pass
+         
+         # æ¸…ç†å¸¸è§çš„ç©ºç›®å½•ä½ç½®
+         for directory in ["src", "public", "static", "templates"]:
+             dir_path = self.project_root / directory
+             if dir_path.exists():
+                 remove_empty_dirs(dir_path)

+ NewsLook é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„å®Œå–„é‡æ„è„šæœ¬
+ ç§»åŠ¨å‰©ä½™æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶å®Œå–„ç›®å½•ç»“æ„
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import shutil
+ from pathlib import Path
+ from datetime import datetime
+ 
+ class CompleteRestructurer:
+     def __init__(self, project_root="."):
+         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
+         self.backup_timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
+     
+     def move_remaining_backend_files(self):
+         """ç§»åŠ¨å‰©ä½™çš„åç«¯æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°backendç›®å½•"""
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨ä¸»è¦åç«¯ç›®å½•
+         backend_directories = [
+             ("app", "backend/app"),
+             ("newslook", "backend/newslook"),
+             ("api", "backend/api"), 
+             ("utils", "backend/utils")
+         ]
+         
+         for source, target in backend_directories:
+             source_path = self.project_root / source
+             target_path = self.project_root / target
+             
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨åç«¯ç›®å½•: {source} -> {target}")
+                 
+                 # å¦‚æœç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå…ˆå¤‡ä»½
+                 if target_path.exists():
+                     backup_path = self.project_root / "backup/legacy_files" / f"{source}_{self.backup_timestamp}"
+                     backup_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                     shutil.move(str(target_path), str(backup_path))
+                     print(f"  ğŸ“¦ åŸç›®å½•å¤‡ä»½è‡³: {backup_path}")
+                 
+                 # ç§»åŠ¨ç›®å½•
+                 target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                 shutil.move(str(source_path), str(target_path))
+                 print(f"  âœ… ç§»åŠ¨å®Œæˆ: {target}")
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨ä¸»è¦çš„Pythonå¯åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶
+         backend_files = [
+             "main.py",
+             "run.py", 
+             "quick_start.py",
+             "start_newslook_full.py",
+             "debug_crawler.py"
+         ]
+         
+         backend_main_dir = self.project_root / "backend"
+         backend_main_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
+         
+         for filename in backend_files:
+             source_file = self.project_root / filename
+             target_file = backend_main_dir / filename
+             
+             if source_file.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨å¯åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶: {filename}")
+                 shutil.copy2(source_file, target_file)
+                 # ä¿ç•™æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„åŸæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä»¥å…å½±å“ç°æœ‰å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬
+     
+     def organize_frontend_structure(self):
+         """æ•´ç†å‰ç«¯ç›®å½•ç»“æ„"""
+         frontend_root = self.project_root / "frontend"
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨é”™è¯¯æ”¾ç½®çš„å‰ç«¯æ–‡ä»¶
+         misplaced_frontend_files = [
+             ("src", "frontend/src"),
+             ("public", "frontend/public")
+         ]
+         
+         for source, target in misplaced_frontend_files:
+             source_path = self.project_root / source
+             target_path = self.project_root / target
+             
+             if source_path.exists() and source_path != target_path:
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨å‰ç«¯æ–‡ä»¶: {source} -> {target}")
+                 
+                 # åˆå¹¶ç›®å½•å†…å®¹
+                 if target_path.exists():
+                     # å°†æºç›®å½•å†…å®¹åˆå¹¶åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ç›®å½•
+                     for item in source_path.rglob("*"):
+                         if item.is_file():
+                             relative_path = item.relative_to(source_path)
+                             target_file = target_path / relative_path
+                             target_file.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                             
+                             if not target_file.exists():
+                                 shutil.copy2(item, target_file)
+                     
+                     # åˆ é™¤æºç›®å½•
+                     shutil.rmtree(source_path)
+                 else:
+                     # ç›´æ¥ç§»åŠ¨
+                     target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                     shutil.move(str(source_path), str(target_path))
+                 
+                 print(f"  âœ… å‰ç«¯æ–‡ä»¶ç§»åŠ¨å®Œæˆ")
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨faviconåˆ°æ­£ç¡®ä½ç½®
+         favicon_source = self.project_root / "favicon.svg"
+         favicon_target = frontend_root / "public/favicon.svg"
+         
+         if favicon_source.exists():
+             favicon_target.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+             if not favicon_target.exists():
+                 shutil.copy2(favicon_source, favicon_target)
+                 print(f"âœ… ç§»åŠ¨favicon: favicon.svg -> frontend/public/")
+     
+     def organize_data_and_docs(self):
+         """æ•´ç†æ•°æ®å’Œæ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®ç›¸å…³ç›®å½•
+         data_directories = [
+             ("databases", "data/databases"),

+             ("logs", "data/logs"),
+             ("testlogs", "data/testlogs"),
+             ("test_data", "data/test_data"),
+             ("test_crawl", "data/test_crawl")
+         ]
+         
+         for source, target in data_directories:
+             source_path = self.project_root / source
+             target_path = self.project_root / target
+             
+             if source_path.exists() and source_path != target_path:
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®ç›®å½•: {source} -> {target}")
+                 target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                 
+                 if target_path.exists():
+                     backup_path = self.project_root / "backup/legacy_files" / f"{source}_{self.backup_timestamp}"
+                     backup_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                     shutil.move(str(target_path), str(backup_path))
+                 
+                 shutil.move(str(source_path), str(target_path))
+                 print(f"  âœ… ç§»åŠ¨å®Œæˆ")
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶
+         doc_files = [
+             ("README.md", "docs/README.md"),
+             ("CHANGELOG.md", "docs/CHANGELOG.md"),
+             ("ARCHITECTURE_REFACTORING.md", "docs/ARCHITECTURE_REFACTORING.md"),
+             ("OPTIMIZATION_PLAN.md", "docs/OPTIMIZATION_PLAN.md"),
+             ("WEBç•Œé¢ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—.md", "docs/WEBç•Œé¢ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—.md"),
+             ("WEBåº”ç”¨è¯´æ˜.md", "docs/WEBåº”ç”¨è¯´æ˜.md"),
+             ("DATABASE_CLEANUP_REPORT.md", "docs/DATABASE_CLEANUP_REPORT.md"),
+             ("CLEANUP_REPORT.md", "docs/CLEANUP_REPORT.md")
+         ]
+         
+         docs_dir = self.project_root / "docs"
+         docs_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
+         
+         for source_file, target_file in doc_files:
+             source_path = self.project_root / source_file
+             target_path = self.project_root / target_file
+             
+             if source_path.exists() and source_path != target_path:
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡æ¡£: {source_file}")
+                 target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+                 shutil.copy2(source_path, target_path)
+                 # ä¿ç•™æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„README.md
+                 if source_file != "README.md":
+                     source_path.unlink()

+     def organize_scripts_and_tools(self):
+         """æ•´ç†è„šæœ¬å’Œå·¥å…·æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨è„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°scriptsç›®å½•
+         script_files = [
+             "check_db_data.py",
+             "test_web_db.py", 
+             "test_comprehensive_crawler.py",
+             "restructure_project.py"
+         ]
+         
+         scripts_dir = self.project_root / "scripts"
+         scripts_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
+         
+         for script_file in script_files:
+             source_path = self.project_root / script_file
+             target_path = scripts_dir / script_file
+             
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨è„šæœ¬: {script_file}")
+                 shutil.copy2(source_path, target_path)
+                 source_path.unlink()
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬åˆ°scriptsç›®å½•
+         startup_scripts = [
+             "start.bat",

+             "start_newslook_improved.bat"
+         ]
+         
+         for script_file in startup_scripts:
+             source_path = self.project_root / script_file
+             target_path = scripts_dir / script_file
+             
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬: {script_file}")
+                 shutil.copy2(source_path, target_path)
+                 # ä¿ç•™æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„ä¸»è¦å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬
+                 if script_file not in ["start.bat", "start.sh"]:
+                     source_path.unlink()
+         
+         # ç§»åŠ¨å¤‡ä»½è„šæœ¬ç›®å½•
+         backup_scripts_source = self.project_root / "backup_scripts"
+         backup_scripts_target = scripts_dir / "backup"
+         
+         if backup_scripts_source.exists():
+             print(f"ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨å¤‡ä»½è„šæœ¬ç›®å½•")
+             shutil.move(str(backup_scripts_source), str(backup_scripts_target))

+     def organize_requirements(self):
+         """æ•´ç†ä¾èµ–æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         requirements_files = [
+             "requirements.txt"
+         ]

+         config_dir = self.project_root / "backend/config"

+                 print(f"ğŸ”„ å¤åˆ¶ä¾èµ–æ–‡ä»¶: {req_file}")

+                 # ä¿ç•™æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„requirements.txtä»¥ä¾¿å®‰è£…
+     
+     def clean_empty_directories(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†ç©ºç›®å½•"""
+         def remove_empty_dirs(path):
+             if not path.is_dir():
+                 return
+             
+             # é€’å½’æ¸…ç†å­ç›®å½•
+             subdirs = [p for p in path.iterdir() if p.is_dir()]
+             for subdir in subdirs:
+                 remove_empty_dirs(subdir)
+             
+             # å¦‚æœç›®å½•ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ é™¤å®ƒ
+             try:
+                 if not any(path.iterdir()):
+                     path.rmdir()
+                     print(f"ğŸ—‘ï¸ åˆ é™¤ç©ºç›®å½•: {path}")
+             except (OSError, PermissionError):
+                 pass
+         
+         # æ£€æŸ¥å¸¸è§çš„å¯èƒ½ä¸ºç©ºçš„ç›®å½•
+         potential_empty_dirs = [
+             "static", "templates", "web", "old_static", "legacy"
+         ]
+         
+         for dir_name in potential_empty_dirs:
+             dir_path = self.project_root / dir_name
+             if dir_path.exists():
+                 remove_empty_dirs(dir_path)
+

+     def run_complete_restructure(self):
+         """æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ•´çš„é‡æ„æµç¨‹"""
+         print("ğŸ”§ å¼€å§‹å®Œå–„ NewsLook é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„...")
+         print("=" * 50)
+         
+         try:
+             # 1. ç§»åŠ¨å‰©ä½™åç«¯æ–‡ä»¶
+             print("\nğŸ ç¬¬1æ­¥: ç§»åŠ¨å‰©ä½™åç«¯æ–‡ä»¶")
+             self.move_remaining_backend_files()
+             
+             # 2. æ•´ç†å‰ç«¯ç»“æ„
+             print("\nğŸ¨ ç¬¬2æ­¥: æ•´ç†å‰ç«¯ç›®å½•ç»“æ„")
+             self.organize_frontend_structure()
+             
+             # 3. æ•´ç†æ•°æ®å’Œæ–‡æ¡£
+             print("\nğŸ“Š ç¬¬3æ­¥: æ•´ç†æ•°æ®å’Œæ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶")
+             self.organize_data_and_docs()
+             
+             # 4. æ•´ç†è„šæœ¬å’Œå·¥å…·
+             print("\nğŸ› ï¸ ç¬¬4æ­¥: æ•´ç†è„šæœ¬å’Œå·¥å…·æ–‡ä»¶")
+             self.organize_scripts_and_tools()
+             
+             # 5. æ•´ç†ä¾èµ–æ–‡ä»¶
+             print("\nğŸ“¦ ç¬¬5æ­¥: æ•´ç†ä¾èµ–æ–‡ä»¶")
+             self.organize_requirements()
+             
+             # 6. æ¸…ç†ç©ºç›®å½•
+             print("\nğŸ§¹ ç¬¬6æ­¥: æ¸…ç†ç©ºç›®å½•")
+             self.clean_empty_directories()
+             
+             # 7. åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®æ¦‚è§ˆ
+             print("\nğŸ“‹ ç¬¬7æ­¥: åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„æ¦‚è§ˆ")
+             self.create_project_overview()
+             
+             print("\n" + "=" * 50)
+             print("âœ… é¡¹ç›®é‡æ„å®Œå–„å®Œæˆ!")
+             print("\nğŸ“ æ–°çš„é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„:")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ frontend/     # å‰ç«¯åº”ç”¨")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ backend/      # åç«¯åº”ç”¨") 
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ data/         # æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/      # è„šæœ¬å·¥å…·")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ tests/        # æµ‹è¯•æ–‡ä»¶")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ examples/     # ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ")
+             print("â”œâ”€â”€ docs/         # é¡¹ç›®æ–‡æ¡£")
+             print("â””â”€â”€ backup/       # å¤‡ä»½æ–‡ä»¶")
+             print("\nğŸ‰ æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„æ•´ç†å®Œæˆ!")
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ é‡æ„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯: {e}")
+             return False
+         
+         return True
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     restructurer = CompleteRestructurer()
+     success = restructurer.run_complete_restructure()
+     
+     if success:
+         print("\nğŸ‰ é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„æ•´ç†æˆåŠŸ!")
+     else:
+         print("\nâš ï¸ æ•´ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­é‡åˆ°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥æ—¥å¿—") 
```

+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

+ NewsLook é¡¹ç›®æœ€ç»ˆæ¸…ç†è„šæœ¬

+ 
+ import os
+ import shutil
+ from pathlib import Path
+ from datetime import datetime
+ 
+ class FinalCleanup:
+     def __init__(self, project_root="."):
+         self.project_root = Path(project_root)
+         self.backup_timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
+     
+     def clean_root_duplicates(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„é‡å¤æ–‡ä»¶"""
+         print("ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†æ ¹ç›®å½•é‡å¤æ–‡ä»¶...")

+         # ç§»åŠ¨æ ¹ç›®å½•çš„é‡å¤è„šæœ¬æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°scripts

+             "debug_crawler.py",
+             "quick_start.py", 
+             "start_newslook_full.py",
+             "complete_restructure.py",
+             "RESTRUCTURE_REPORT_20250602_173519.md"
+         ]
+         
+         scripts_dir = self.project_root / "scripts"
+         scripts_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
+         
+         for script_file in scripts_to_move:
+             source_path = self.project_root / script_file
+             target_path = scripts_dir / script_file
+             
+             if source_path.exists():
+                 print(f"  ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°scripts: {script_file}")
+                 if target_path.exists():
+                     target_path.unlink()  # åˆ é™¤å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶
+                 shutil.move(str(source_path), str(target_path))

+         main_files = ["main.py", "run.py"]

+

+             source_path = self.project_root / main_file
+             target_path = backend_dir / main_file
+             
+             if source_path.exists() and not target_path.exists():
+                 print(f"  ğŸ”„ å¤åˆ¶åˆ°backend: {main_file}")
+                 shutil.copy2(source_path, target_path)

+         # ç§»åŠ¨faviconåˆ°æ­£ç¡®ä½ç½®

+         favicon_target = self.project_root / "frontend/public/favicon.svg"

+         if favicon_source.exists():
+             favicon_target.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
+             if not favicon_target.exists():
+                 print(f"  ğŸ”„ ç§»åŠ¨faviconåˆ°frontend/public/")
+                 shutil.move(str(favicon_source), str(favicon_target))
+             else:
+                 favicon_source.unlink()
