+     def organize_remaining_directories(self):

+             if target_sources.exists():

+     def validate_structure(self):
+         """éªŒè¯é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„"""

Now let me create the Service Worker for offline caching:

---

```diff
- 
+ // NewsLook Service Worker - ç¦»çº¿ç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥
+ const CACHE_NAME = 'newslook-v1.0.0';
+ const STATIC_CACHE = `${CACHE_NAME}-static`;
+ const DYNAMIC_CACHE = `${CACHE_NAME}-dynamic`;
+ const API_CACHE = `${CACHE_NAME}-api`;
+ 
+ // é¢„ç¼“å­˜çš„é™æ€èµ„æº
+ const STATIC_ASSETS = [
+   '/',
+   '/index.html',
+   '/src/main.js',
+   '/src/style.css',
+   '/favicon.svg',
+   '/favicon.png',
+   '/assets/fonts/Inter-Regular.woff2',
+   '/assets/fonts/Inter-Medium.woff2',
+   '/assets/fonts/Inter-SemiBold.woff2',
+   '/assets/fonts/NotoSansSC-Regular.woff2',
+   '/assets/fonts/NotoSansSC-Medium.woff2'
+ ];
+ 
+ // APIç«¯ç‚¹ç¼“å­˜é…ç½®
+ const API_CACHE_CONFIG = {
+   '/api/news': { strategy: 'networkFirst', maxAge: 300000 }, // 5åˆ†é’Ÿ
+   '/api/crawler/status': { strategy: 'networkFirst', maxAge: 30000 }, // 30ç§’
+   '/api/system/health': { strategy: 'networkFirst', maxAge: 60000 }, // 1åˆ†é’Ÿ
+   '/api/user/settings': { strategy: 'cacheFirst', maxAge: 3600000 } // 1å°æ—¶
+ };
+ 
+ // å®‰è£…äº‹ä»¶ - é¢„ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº
+ self.addEventListener('install', event => {
+   console.log('[SW] å®‰è£…Service Worker');
+   
+   event.waitUntil(
+     Promise.all([
+       // ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº
+       caches.open(STATIC_CACHE)
+         .then(cache => {
+           console.log('[SW] ç¼“å­˜é™æ€èµ„æº');
+           return cache.addAll(STATIC_ASSETS);
+         }),
+       
+       // è·³è¿‡ç­‰å¾…ï¼Œç«‹å³æ¿€æ´»
+       self.skipWaiting()
+     ])
+   );
+ });
+ 
+ // æ¿€æ´»äº‹ä»¶ - æ¸…ç†æ—§ç¼“å­˜
+ self.addEventListener('activate', event => {
+   console.log('[SW] æ¿€æ´»Service Worker');
+   
+   event.waitUntil(
+     Promise.all([
+       // æ¸…ç†æ—§ç¼“å­˜
+       caches.keys().then(cacheNames => {
+         return Promise.all(
+           cacheNames
+             .filter(cacheName => {
+               return cacheName.startsWith('newslook-') && 
+                      !cacheName.includes('v1.0.0');
+             })
+             .map(cacheName => {
+               console.log('[SW] åˆ é™¤æ—§ç¼“å­˜:', cacheName);
+               return caches.delete(cacheName);
+             })
+         );
+       }),
+       
+       // ç«‹å³æ¥ç®¡æ‰€æœ‰é¡µé¢
+       self.clients.claim()
+     ])
+   );
+ });
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆª - å®æ–½ç¼“å­˜ç­–ç•¥
+ self.addEventListener('fetch', event => {
+   const { request } = event;
+   const url = new URL(request.url);
+   
+   // è·³è¿‡éGETè¯·æ±‚
+   if (request.method !== 'GET') return;
+   
+   // è·³è¿‡Chromeæ‰©å±•è¯·æ±‚
+   if (url.protocol === 'chrome-extension:') return;
+   
+   // APIè¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†
+   if (url.pathname.startsWith('/api/')) {
+     event.respondWith(handleApiRequest(request));
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   // é™æ€èµ„æºå¤„ç†
+   if (isStaticAsset(url.pathname)) {
+     event.respondWith(handleStaticRequest(request));
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   // é¡µé¢è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†
+   if (request.mode === 'navigate') {
+     event.respondWith(handleNavigationRequest(request));
+     return;
+   }
+   
+   // å…¶ä»–è¯·æ±‚ä½¿ç”¨ç½‘ç»œä¼˜å…ˆç­–ç•¥
+   event.respondWith(handleOtherRequest(request));
+ });
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†APIè¯·æ±‚
+ async function handleApiRequest(request) {
+   const url = new URL(request.url);
+   const endpoint = url.pathname;
+   const config = getApiCacheConfig(endpoint);
+   
+   if (!config) {
+     return fetch(request);
+   }
+   
+   const cache = await caches.open(API_CACHE);
+   
+   if (config.strategy === 'networkFirst') {
+     return networkFirst(request, cache, config.maxAge);
+   } else if (config.strategy === 'cacheFirst') {
+     return cacheFirst(request, cache, config.maxAge);
+   }
+   
+   return fetch(request);
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†é™æ€èµ„æºè¯·æ±‚
+ async function handleStaticRequest(request) {
+   const cache = await caches.open(STATIC_CACHE);
+   const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request);
+   
+   if (cachedResponse) {
+     return cachedResponse;
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request);
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       cache.put(request, networkResponse.clone());
+     }
+     return networkResponse;
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('[SW] é™æ€èµ„æºåŠ è½½å¤±è´¥:', request.url);
+     throw error;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†å¯¼èˆªè¯·æ±‚
+ async function handleNavigationRequest(request) {
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request);
+     return networkResponse;
+   } catch (error) {
+     // ç½‘ç»œå¤±è´¥æ—¶è¿”å›ç¼“å­˜çš„é¦–é¡µ
+     const cache = await caches.open(STATIC_CACHE);
+     const cachedPage = await cache.match('/') || await cache.match('/index.html');
+     
+     if (cachedPage) {
+       return cachedPage;
+     }
+     
+     // è¿”å›ç¦»çº¿é¡µé¢
+     return new Response(
+       createOfflinePage(),
+       {
+         status: 200,
+         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'text/html' }
+       }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†å…¶ä»–è¯·æ±‚
+ async function handleOtherRequest(request) {
+   const cache = await caches.open(DYNAMIC_CACHE);
+   
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request);
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       cache.put(request, networkResponse.clone());
+     }
+     return networkResponse;
+   } catch (error) {
+     const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request);
+     if (cachedResponse) {
+       return cachedResponse;
+     }
+     throw error;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç½‘ç»œä¼˜å…ˆç­–ç•¥
+ async function networkFirst(request, cache, maxAge) {
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request);
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       const responseWithTimestamp = new Response(networkResponse.body, {
+         status: networkResponse.status,
+         statusText: networkResponse.statusText,
+         headers: {
+           ...Object.fromEntries(networkResponse.headers.entries()),
+           'sw-cached-at': Date.now().toString()
+         }
+       });
+       cache.put(request, responseWithTimestamp.clone());
+     }
+     return networkResponse;
+   } catch (error) {
+     const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request);
+     if (cachedResponse && !isCacheExpired(cachedResponse, maxAge)) {
+       return cachedResponse;
+     }
+     throw error;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç¼“å­˜ä¼˜å…ˆç­–ç•¥
+ async function cacheFirst(request, cache, maxAge) {
+   const cachedResponse = await cache.match(request);
+   
+   if (cachedResponse && !isCacheExpired(cachedResponse, maxAge)) {
+     return cachedResponse;
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const networkResponse = await fetch(request);
+     if (networkResponse.ok) {
+       const responseWithTimestamp = new Response(networkResponse.body, {
+         status: networkResponse.status,
+         statusText: networkResponse.statusText,
+         headers: {
+           ...Object.fromEntries(networkResponse.headers.entries()),
+           'sw-cached-at': Date.now().toString()
+         }
+       });
+       cache.put(request, responseWithTimestamp.clone());
+     }
+     return networkResponse;
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (cachedResponse) {
+       return cachedResponse;
+     }
+     throw error;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ£€æŸ¥ç¼“å­˜æ˜¯å¦è¿‡æœŸ
+ function isCacheExpired(response, maxAge) {
+   const cachedAt = response.headers.get('sw-cached-at');
+   if (!cachedAt) return true;
+   
+   const cacheAge = Date.now() - parseInt(cachedAt);
+   return cacheAge > maxAge;
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–APIç¼“å­˜é…ç½®
+ function getApiCacheConfig(endpoint) {
+   for (const [pattern, config] of Object.entries(API_CACHE_CONFIG)) {
+     if (endpoint.includes(pattern)) {
+       return config;
+     }
+   }
+   return null;
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºé™æ€èµ„æº
+ function isStaticAsset(pathname) {
+   const staticExtensions = ['.js', '.css', '.woff2', '.woff', '.svg', '.png', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.gif', '.ico'];
+   return staticExtensions.some(ext => pathname.endsWith(ext)) || 
+          pathname.startsWith('/assets/') ||
+          pathname === '/favicon.svg' ||
+          pathname === '/favicon.png';
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºç¦»çº¿é¡µé¢
+ function createOfflinePage() {
+   return `
+ <!DOCTYPE html>
+ <html lang="zh-CN">
+ <head>
+   <meta charset="UTF-8">
+   <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
+   <title>ç¦»çº¿æ¨¡å¼ - NewsLook</title>
+   <style>
+     body {
+       font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif;

+       font-size: 64px;

+     }
+     .offline-title {
+       font-size: 32px;
+       margin-bottom: 16px;
+       font-weight: 600;
+     }
+     .offline-message {
+       font-size: 18px;
+       opacity: 0.9;
+       margin-bottom: 30px;
+       max-width: 500px;
+       line-height: 1.5;
+     }
+     .retry-button {
+       background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);

+       background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);

+     }
+   </style>
+ </head>
+ <body>
+   <div class="offline-icon">ğŸ“¡</div>
+   <h1 class="offline-title">ç¦»çº¿æ¨¡å¼</h1>
+   <p class="offline-message">
+     å½“å‰ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œæ‚¨æ­£åœ¨æŸ¥çœ‹ç¦»çº¿ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚
+     <br>
+     è¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥åé‡æ–°åŠ è½½é¡µé¢ã€‚
+   </p>
+   <button class="retry-button" onclick="window.location.reload()">
+     é‡æ–°è¿æ¥
+   </button>
+ </body>
+ </html>
+   `;
+ }
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬æ¶ˆæ¯äº‹ä»¶
+ self.addEventListener('message', event => {
+   if (event.data && event.data.type === 'SKIP_WAITING') {
+     self.skipWaiting();
+   }
+   
+   if (event.data && event.data.type === 'CLEAR_CACHE') {
+     event.waitUntil(
+       caches.keys().then(cacheNames => {
+         return Promise.all(
+           cacheNames.map(cacheName => caches.delete(cacheName))
+         );
+       }).then(() => {
+         event.ports[0].postMessage({ success: true });
+       })
+     );
+   }
+ });
+ 
+ console.log('[SW] Service WorkeråŠ è½½å®Œæˆ'); 
```

Now let me create a performance analysis script:

---

```diff
- 
+ #!/usr/bin/env node
+ 
+ /**
+  * NewsLook æ€§èƒ½å®¡è®¡è„šæœ¬
+  * åˆ†ææ„å»ºäº§ç‰©å’Œè¿è¡Œæ—¶æ€§èƒ½
+  */
+ 
+ import fs from 'fs/promises';
+ import path from 'path';
+ import { fileURLToPath } from 'url';
+ 
+ const __filename = fileURLToPath(import.meta.url);
+ const __dirname = path.dirname(__filename);
+ const projectRoot = path.join(__dirname, '..');
+ const distDir = path.join(projectRoot, 'dist');
+ 
+ // æ€§èƒ½æŒ‡æ ‡é˜ˆå€¼
+ const PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS = {
+   // æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°é™åˆ¶ (KB)
+   maxJsFileSize: 500,
+   maxCssFileSize: 100,
+   maxImageSize: 200,
+   maxFontSize: 100,
+   
+   // æ€»ä½“å¤§å°é™åˆ¶ (MB)
+   maxTotalSize: 5,
+   maxJsSize: 2,
+   maxCssSize: 0.5,
+   
+   // æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡é™åˆ¶
+   maxJsFiles: 10,
+   maxCssFiles: 5,
+   maxImageFiles: 20,
+   
+   // Gzipå‹ç¼©æ¯”ä¾‹ (æœŸæœ›å‹ç¼©åˆ°åŸå§‹å¤§å°çš„ç™¾åˆ†æ¯”)
+   expectedGzipRatio: 0.3
+ };
+ 
+ // æ€§èƒ½å»ºè®®
+ const PERFORMANCE_SUGGESTIONS = {
+   largeJs: 'å»ºè®®æ‹†åˆ†å¤§å‹JSæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€å¯¼å…¥',
+   largeCss: 'å»ºè®®ç§»é™¤æœªä½¿ç”¨çš„CSSï¼Œä½¿ç”¨CSSå‹ç¼©',
+   largeImage: 'å»ºè®®å‹ç¼©å›¾ç‰‡æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨WebPæ ¼å¼',
+   largeFont: 'å»ºè®®åªåŠ è½½å¿…è¦çš„å­—ä½“å­é›†',
+   tooManyFiles: 'å»ºè®®åˆå¹¶å°æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå‡å°‘HTTPè¯·æ±‚',
+   poorCompression: 'å»ºè®®å¯ç”¨æ›´å¥½çš„å‹ç¼©ç®—æ³•'
+ };
+ 
+ class PerformanceAuditor {
+   constructor() {
+     this.results = {
+       files: [],
+       summary: {},
+       issues: [],
+       suggestions: []
+     };
+   }
+ 
+   async analyzeDistDirectory() {
+     console.log('ğŸ” å¼€å§‹åˆ†ææ„å»ºäº§ç‰©...\n');
+     
+     try {
+       await this.scanDirectory(distDir);
+       this.calculateSummary();
+       this.checkPerformanceIssues();
+       this.generateReport();
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('âŒ åˆ†æå¤±è´¥:', error.message);
+       process.exit(1);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   async scanDirectory(dir, basePath = '') {
+     try {
+       const entries = await fs.readdir(dir, { withFileTypes: true });
+       
+       for (const entry of entries) {
+         const fullPath = path.join(dir, entry.name);
+         const relativePath = path.join(basePath, entry.name);
+         
+         if (entry.isDirectory()) {
+           await this.scanDirectory(fullPath, relativePath);
+         } else {
+           await this.analyzeFile(fullPath, relativePath);
+         }
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn(`âš ï¸  æ— æ³•æ‰«æç›®å½• ${dir}: ${error.message}`);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   async analyzeFile(filePath, relativePath) {
+     try {
+       const stats = await fs.stat(filePath);
+       const ext = path.extname(relativePath).toLowerCase();
+       const size = stats.size;
+       
+       const fileInfo = {
+         path: relativePath,
+         size: size,
+         sizeKB: Math.round(size / 1024 * 100) / 100,
+         type: this.getFileType(ext),
+         ext: ext,
+         gzipEstimate: Math.round(size * 0.3) // ä¼°ç®—Gzipå‹ç¼©åå¤§å°
+       };
+       
+       this.results.files.push(fileInfo);
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn(`âš ï¸  æ— æ³•åˆ†ææ–‡ä»¶ ${filePath}: ${error.message}`);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   getFileType(ext) {
+     const typeMap = {
+       '.js': 'javascript',
+       '.mjs': 'javascript',
+       '.css': 'stylesheet',
+       '.png': 'image',
+       '.jpg': 'image',
+       '.jpeg': 'image',
+       '.gif': 'image',
+       '.svg': 'image',
+       '.webp': 'image',
+       '.woff': 'font',
+       '.woff2': 'font',
+       '.ttf': 'font',
+       '.eot': 'font',
+       '.html': 'html',
+       '.json': 'data',
+       '.ico': 'icon'
+     };
+     
+     return typeMap[ext] || 'other';
+   }
+ 
+   calculateSummary() {
+     const summary = {
+       totalFiles: this.results.files.length,
+       totalSize: 0,
+       totalSizeKB: 0,
+       totalSizeMB: 0,
+       types: {}
+     };
+     
+     for (const file of this.results.files) {
+       summary.totalSize += file.size;
+       
+       if (!summary.types[file.type]) {
+         summary.types[file.type] = {
+           count: 0,
+           size: 0,
+           sizeKB: 0,
+           files: []
+         };
+       }
+       
+       summary.types[file.type].count++;
+       summary.types[file.type].size += file.size;
+       summary.types[file.type].sizeKB += file.sizeKB;
+       summary.types[file.type].files.push(file);
+     }
+     
+     summary.totalSizeKB = Math.round(summary.totalSize / 1024 * 100) / 100;
+     summary.totalSizeMB = Math.round(summary.totalSize / (1024 * 1024) * 100) / 100;
+     
+     this.results.summary = summary;
+   }
+ 
+   checkPerformanceIssues() {
+     const { files, summary } = this.results;
+     const issues = [];
+     const suggestions = [];
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ€»ä½“å¤§å°
+     if (summary.totalSizeMB > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxTotalSize) {
+       issues.push({
+         type: 'warning',
+         category: 'size',
+         message: `æ€»æ„å»ºå¤§å°è¿‡å¤§: ${summary.totalSizeMB}MB (å»ºè®® < ${PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxTotalSize}MB)`
+       });
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥JavaScriptæ–‡ä»¶
+     const jsFiles = files.filter(f => f.type === 'javascript');
+     const totalJsSize = jsFiles.reduce((sum, f) => sum + f.sizeKB, 0) / 1024;
+     
+     if (totalJsSize > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxJsSize) {
+       issues.push({
+         type: 'warning',
+         category: 'javascript',
+         message: `JavaScriptæ€»å¤§å°è¿‡å¤§: ${totalJsSize.toFixed(2)}MB (å»ºè®® < ${PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxJsSize}MB)`
+       });
+       suggestions.push(PERFORMANCE_SUGGESTIONS.largeJs);
+     }
+     
+     if (jsFiles.length > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxJsFiles) {
+       issues.push({
+         type: 'info',
+         category: 'javascript',
+         message: `JavaScriptæ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡è¾ƒå¤š: ${jsFiles.length} (å»ºè®® < ${PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxJsFiles})`
+       });
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥å•ä¸ªå¤§æ–‡ä»¶
+     for (const file of files) {
+       const threshold = PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS[`max${file.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + file.type.slice(1)}FileSize`];
+       
+       if (threshold && file.sizeKB > threshold) {
+         issues.push({
+           type: 'warning',
+           category: file.type,
+           message: `æ–‡ä»¶è¿‡å¤§: ${file.path} (${file.sizeKB}KB > ${threshold}KB)`
+         });
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥CSSæ–‡ä»¶
+     const cssFiles = files.filter(f => f.type === 'stylesheet');
+     const totalCssSize = cssFiles.reduce((sum, f) => sum + f.sizeKB, 0) / 1024;
+     
+     if (totalCssSize > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxCssSize) {
+       issues.push({
+         type: 'warning',
+         category: 'stylesheet',
+         message: `CSSæ€»å¤§å°è¿‡å¤§: ${totalCssSize.toFixed(2)}MB (å»ºè®® < ${PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.maxCssSize}MB)`
+       });
+       suggestions.push(PERFORMANCE_SUGGESTIONS.largeCss);
+     }
+     
+     this.results.issues = issues;
+     this.results.suggestions = [...new Set(suggestions)];
+   }
+ 
+   generateReport() {
+     const { summary, issues, suggestions } = this.results;
+     
+     console.log('ğŸ“Š æ„å»ºäº§ç‰©åˆ†ææŠ¥å‘Š');
+     console.log('='.repeat(50));
+     
+     // æ€»ä½“æ¦‚å†µ
+     console.log('\nğŸ“‹ æ€»ä½“æ¦‚å†µ:');
+     console.log(`   æ€»æ–‡ä»¶æ•°: ${summary.totalFiles}`);
+     console.log(`   æ€»å¤§å°: ${summary.totalSizeMB}MB (${summary.totalSizeKB}KB)`);
+     console.log(`   ä¼°ç®—Gzipå: ${Math.round(summary.totalSizeMB * 0.3 * 100) / 100}MB`);
+     
+     // æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹åˆ†å¸ƒ
+     console.log('\nğŸ“ æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹åˆ†å¸ƒ:');
+     for (const [type, data] of Object.entries(summary.types)) {
+       console.log(`   ${type.padEnd(12)}: ${data.count.toString().padStart(3)} æ–‡ä»¶, ${data.sizeKB.toString().padStart(8)}KB`);
+     }
+     
+     // æœ€å¤§æ–‡ä»¶
+     console.log('\nğŸ“ˆ æœ€å¤§æ–‡ä»¶ (å‰10):');
+     const largestFiles = this.results.files
+       .sort((a, b) => b.sizeKB - a.sizeKB)
+       .slice(0, 10);
+     
+     for (const file of largestFiles) {
+       console.log(`   ${file.sizeKB.toString().padStart(6)}KB  ${file.path}`);
+     }
+     
+     // æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜
+     if (issues.length > 0) {
+       console.log('\nâš ï¸  æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜:');
+       for (const issue of issues) {
+         const icon = issue.type === 'warning' ? 'âš ï¸ ' : 'â„¹ï¸ ';
+         console.log(`   ${icon} ${issue.message}`);
+       }
+     } else {
+       console.log('\nâœ… æœªå‘ç°æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜');
+     }
+     
+     // ä¼˜åŒ–å»ºè®®
+     if (suggestions.length > 0) {
+       console.log('\nğŸ’¡ ä¼˜åŒ–å»ºè®®:');
+       for (const suggestion of suggestions) {
+         console.log(`   â€¢ ${suggestion}`);
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // æ€§èƒ½è¯„åˆ†
+     const score = this.calculatePerformanceScore();
+     console.log('\nâ­ æ€§èƒ½è¯„åˆ†:');
+     console.log(`   ${score}/100 ${this.getScoreEmoji(score)}`);
+     
+     console.log('\n' + '='.repeat(50));
+     
+     // ä¿å­˜è¯¦ç»†æŠ¥å‘Š
+     this.saveDetailedReport();
+   }
+ 
+   calculatePerformanceScore() {
+     let score = 100;
+     const { issues } = this.results;
+     
+     for (const issue of issues) {
+       if (issue.type === 'warning') {
+         score -= 15;
+       } else if (issue.type === 'info') {
+         score -= 5;
+       }
+     }
+     
+     return Math.max(0, score);
+   }
+ 
+   getScoreEmoji(score) {
+     if (score >= 90) return 'ğŸŸ¢ ä¼˜ç§€';
+     if (score >= 70) return 'ğŸŸ¡ è‰¯å¥½';
+     if (score >= 50) return 'ğŸŸ  ä¸€èˆ¬';
+     return 'ğŸ”´ éœ€è¦ä¼˜åŒ–';
+   }
+ 
+   async saveDetailedReport() {
+     const reportPath = path.join(distDir, 'performance-report.json');
+     
+     try {
+       await fs.writeFile(
+         reportPath,
+         JSON.stringify(this.results, null, 2),
+         'utf8'
+       );
+       console.log(`ğŸ“„ è¯¦ç»†æŠ¥å‘Šå·²ä¿å­˜: ${reportPath}`);
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.warn(`âš ï¸  æ— æ³•ä¿å­˜è¯¦ç»†æŠ¥å‘Š: ${error.message}`);
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // è¿è¡Œæ€§èƒ½å®¡è®¡
+ async function main() {
+   console.log('ğŸš€ NewsLook æ€§èƒ½å®¡è®¡å·¥å…·\n');
+   
+   const auditor = new PerformanceAuditor();
+   await auditor.analyzeDistDirectory();
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰§è¡Œä¸»å‡½æ•°
+ if (import.meta.url === `file://${process.argv[1]}`) {
+   main().catch(console.error);
+ }
+ 
+ export default PerformanceAuditor; 
```

+ });

+ ```

+ ### 3. è™šæ‹Ÿæ»šåŠ¨

+ ## ç½‘ç»œä¼˜åŒ–
+ 
+ ### 1. HTTP/2å’ŒHTTP/3æ”¯æŒ
+ 
+ ```nginx
+ # Nginxé…ç½®ç¤ºä¾‹

+     listen 443 ssl http2;
+     listen 443 ssl http3 reuseport;
+     
+     # å¯ç”¨Brotliå‹ç¼©

+     brotli_types text/plain text/css application/json application/javascript;

+ ```
+ 
+ ### 2. èµ„æºå‹ç¼©
+ 
+ ```javascript
+ // æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯Gzip/Brotlié…ç½®
+ app.use(compression({
+   level: 6,
+   threshold: 1024,
+   filter: (req, res) => {
+     if (req.headers['x-no-compression']) {
+       return false;

+ async function processLargeData(data) {
+   const chunkSize = 1000;
+   const chunks = [];
+   
+   for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i += chunkSize) {
+     chunks.push(data.slice(i, i + chunkSize));

+ ### 3. ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚ä¼˜åŒ–

+ // âœ… è¯·æ±‚ç¼“å­˜å’Œå»é‡
+ const requestCache = new Map();
+ 
+ async function cachedRequest(url, options = {}) {
+   const cacheKey = `${url}:${JSON.stringify(options)}`;
+   
+   if (requestCache.has(cacheKey)) {
+     return requestCache.get(cacheKey);
+   }
+   
+   const promise = fetch(url, options).then(res => res.json());
+   requestCache.set(cacheKey, promise);
+   
+   // 5åˆ†é’Ÿåæ¸…é™¤ç¼“å­˜
+   setTimeout(() => {
+     requestCache.delete(cacheKey);
+   }, 5 * 60 * 1000);
+   
+   return promise;
+ }
+ 
+ // âœ… å¹¶å‘è¯·æ±‚æ§åˆ¶
+ const requestQueue = new PQueue({ concurrency: 3 });
+ 
+ function queuedRequest(url, options) {
+   return requestQueue.add(() => fetch(url, options));
+ }
+ ```

## ğŸ¯ **å®Œå…¨è§£å†³çš„æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜**

### âœ… **å¤–éƒ¨å­—ä½“ä¾èµ–** - å·²å½»åº•ç§»é™¤

### âœ… **Service Workerç¦»çº¿ç¼“å­˜** - å·²å®Œæ•´å®ç°

+ ### ğŸš€ ä¼˜åŒ–æªæ–½

+ #### å‰ç«¯ä¼˜åŒ–
+ ```javascript

+   '/api/news': 'networkFirst',      // 5åˆ†é’Ÿç¼“å­˜
+   '/api/stats': 'networkFirst',     // 30ç§’ç¼“å­˜
+   '/assets/*': 'cacheFirst'         // æ°¸ä¹…ç¼“å­˜
+ };
+ 
+ // 3. æœ¬åœ°å­—ä½“å’Œèµ„æº
+ // ç§»é™¤Google Fontsï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æœ¬åœ°woff2å­—ä½“
+ // å›¾ç‰‡WebPæ ¼å¼ï¼Œå‹ç¼©ç‡æå‡30%+
+ ```
+ 
+ #### åç«¯ä¼˜åŒ–
+ ```python
+ # 1. æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢ä¼˜åŒ–
+ @cached(timeout=300)  # 5åˆ†é’Ÿç¼“å­˜
+ def get_news_stats():
+     return db.session.query(
+         func.count(News.id),
+         func.avg(News.word_count)
+     ).first()
+ 
+ # 2. å¼‚æ­¥çˆ¬è™«
+ async def crawl_multiple_sources():
+     tasks = [crawl_source(source) for source in sources]
+     results = await asyncio.gather(*tasks, return_exceptions=True)
+     return results
+ 
+ # 3. è¿æ¥æ± ä¼˜åŒ–
+ app.config['SQLALCHEMY_ENGINE_OPTIONS'] = {
+     'pool_size': 20,
+     'pool_recycle': 3600,
+     'pool_pre_ping': True
+ }
+ ```

```diff
- 
+ # final_review_gate.py
+ import sys
+ import os
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     # Try to make stdout unbuffered for more responsive interaction.
+     # This might not work on all platforms or if stdout is not a TTY,
+     # but it's a good practice for this kind of interactive script.
+     try:
+         sys.stdout = os.fdopen(sys.stdout.fileno(), 'w', buffering=1)
+     except Exception:
+         pass # Ignore if unbuffering fails, e.g., in certain environments
+ 
+     try:
+         sys.stderr = os.fdopen(sys.stderr.fileno(), 'w', buffering=1)
+     except Exception:
+         pass # Ignore
+ 
+     print("--- FINAL REVIEW GATE ACTIVE ---", flush=True)
+     print("AI has completed its primary actions. Awaiting your review or further sub-prompts.", flush=True)
+     print("Type your sub-prompt, or one of: 'TASK_COMPLETE', 'Done', 'Quit', 'q' to signal completion.", flush=True) # MODIFIED
+     
+     active_session = True
+     while active_session:
+         try:
+             # Signal that the script is ready for input.
+             # The AI doesn't need to parse this, but it's good for user visibility.
+             print("REVIEW_GATE_AWAITING_INPUT:", end="", flush=True) 
+             
+             line = sys.stdin.readline()
+             
+             if not line:  # EOF
+                 print("--- REVIEW GATE: STDIN CLOSED (EOF), EXITING SCRIPT ---", flush=True)
+                 active_session = False
+                 break
+             
+             user_input = line.strip()
+ 
+             # Check for exit conditions
+             if user_input.upper() in ['TASK_COMPLETE', 'DONE', 'QUIT', 'Q']: # MODIFIED: Empty string no longer exits
+                 print(f"--- REVIEW GATE: USER SIGNALED COMPLETION WITH '{user_input.upper()}' ---", flush=True)
+                 active_session = False
+                 break
+             elif user_input: # If there's any other non-empty input (and not a completion command)
+                 # This is the critical line the AI will "listen" for.
+                 print(f"USER_REVIEW_SUB_PROMPT: {user_input}", flush=True)
+             # If user_input was empty (and not a completion command),
+             # the loop simply continues, and "REVIEW_GATE_AWAITING_INPUT:" will be printed again.
+             
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("--- REVIEW GATE: SESSION INTERRUPTED BY USER (KeyboardInterrupt) ---", flush=True)
+             active_session = False
+             break
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"--- REVIEW GATE SCRIPT ERROR: {e} ---", flush=True)
+             active_session = False
+             break
+             
+     print("--- FINAL REVIEW GATE SCRIPT EXITED ---", flush=True) 
```
